#comment: Arujien's letter

#comment: The husk of a mana seeker.

#comment: The horn of a gargoyle.

#comment: Gather forty wolf pelts and take them to Trader Lector of the weapons and armor shop.

#comment: A Sylph Headband

#comment: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time.

name: Mana Drug
#comment: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time.

name: Healing Potion
#comment: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time.

name: Mana Potion
#comment: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade A)
#comment: When enchanted, the P. Atk. of A-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt weapon/one-handed, dagger and spear etc. will increase by 4. The P. Atk of sword/two-handed, blunt weapon/two-handed, dualsword, and fist-fighting weapon/two-handed will increase by 5. The P. Atk. of bow weapons will increase by 8. The M. Atk. of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade A)
#comment: Increases the P. Def. of an A-Grade armor or accessory by 1, and from +4, the P. Def will increase by 3. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. One-piece type armor can be safely enchanted up to +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade A)
#comment: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (Grade A)
#comment: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A-Grade armor.

name: Endeavor Potion
#comment: A magical, liquid medicine that increases willpower.

name: Haste Potion
#comment: A magical potion that increases movement speed

name: Potion of Alacrity
#comment: A magical potion that increases attack speed

name: Scroll of Escape
#comment: A scroll of enchantment that relocates you to the nearest village.

name: Scroll of Resurrection
#comment: A scroll of enchantment that resuscitates a dead person.

name: Sword of Solidarity
#comment: A bronze sword crafted long ago in memory of the union between the Humans and the Elves.

name: Broken Sword Handle
#comment: The handle portion of the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Broken Blade Bottom
#comment: Take this, and the upper portion of the blade to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Broken Blade Top
#comment: Take this, and the lower portion of the blade to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Altran's Note
#comment: A letter requesting the handle of the sword from Roien. Take this to Grand Master Roien of Cedric's Training Hall.

name: Sword of Sentinel
#comment: A steel blade issued to those fighters that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods.

name: Staff of Sentinel
#comment: A staff issued to those magicians that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods.

name: Alberius's List
#comment: Deliver the medicine to Sentinel Berros, Sentinel Veltress, Sentinel Rayen, and Sentinel Gartrandell.

name: Wand of Adept
#comment: The wand presented to those who have finished their studies at the school of magic.

name: Gallint's Oak Wand
#comment: An oak wand enchanted by Gallint's spell. This will capture and seal the spirit of mirrors.

name: Orc Amulet
#comment: An amulet that the Orcs carry for magical purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Red Sunset Staff
#comment: A staff used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan.

name: Roien's Letter
#comment: A letter on which Roien summarized the historical information related to the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: Bone fragments obtained from the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and take to Tetrarch Kaitar.

name: Tateossian Earring
#comment: Tateossian Earring. Produces the effect of MP +31.

name: Majestic Earring
#comment: Majestic Earring. Produces the effect of MP +25.

name: Phoenix Earring
#comment: Phoenix Earring. Produces the effect of M. Def. +3 and MP +20.

name: Ring of Knowledge
#comment: A gold ring with delicately engraved rune characters of knowledge.

name: Ring of Anguish
#comment: A gold ring with engraved rune characters of anguish.

name: Tateossian Ring
#comment: Tateossian Ring. Produces the effect of MP +21.

name: Majestic Ring
#comment: Majestic Ring. Produces the effect of MP +17.

name: Phoenix Ring
#comment: Phoenix Ring. Produces the effect of MP +13.

name: Necklace of Knowledge
#comment: A silver necklace engraved with rune characters of knowledge.

name: Necklace of Anguish
#comment: A silver necklace engraved with rune characters of anguish.

#comment: Tateossian Necklace. Produces the effect of MP +42.

name: Majestic Necklace
#comment: Majestic Necklace. Produces the effect of MP +33.

name: Phoenix Necklace
#comment: Phoenix Necklace. Produces the effect of MP +26.

name: Directions to Ruins
#comment: Follow the northwestern path from the village, and head west when you meet the Obelisk of Victory. The entrance to the ruins lies at the slope of the mountain.

name: Skeleton Buckler
#comment: A small wooden shield that perpetrators of mages use.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (Grade B)
#comment: When enchanted, the P. Atk. of B-Grade weapons such as one-handed swords and blunt weapons, daggers and spears increases by 3. The P. Atk of two-handed swords and blunt weapons, dualswords, and two-handed fist-fighting weapons increases by 4. The P. Atk. of bow weapons increases by 6. The M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 3. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

Atk of two-handed swords and blunt weapons, dualswords, and two-handed fist-fighting weapons increases by 6. The P. Atk. of bow weapons increases by 10. The M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 4. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Orcish Arrowhead
#comment: An arrowhead that Turath orc marksmen use on Talking Island. Collect these and take to Master Minia.

name: Alberius's Letter
#comment: A letter from Alberius. Take this to Master Cobendell.

name: Evergreen Amulet
#comment: A necklace set with a green elemental stone. You must possess this to slay the dryad and obtain the dryad's tears.

name: Dryad's Tears
#comment: A jewel that contains the essence of a dryad's soul. Gather ten of these and take them to Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell Medicine
#comment: Cobendell's medicine

name: Karrod's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Blacksmith Karrod. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon in the Shilen Temple.

name: Cecktinon's First Voucher
#comment: An introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Take this and seek Magister Harne in the village.

name: Cecktinon's Second Voucher
#comment: An introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt skeletons, and gather 10 bone fragments.

name: Soul Catcher
#comment: An item used during the exorcism ritual to call upon a spirit of the dead. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Preserving Oil
#comment: An oil that when used, prevents the rotting of corpses. Take this and go hunt zombies in the swamps.

name: Zombie Head
#comment: The head of tree Elf zombies that have been cut after they are defeated. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Steelbender Head
#comment: Please, I beg of you! Don't take me to that brutal blacksmith!

name: Blood Saber
#comment: An Oriharukon sword crafted in the Abella style of the east.

name: 1st Mark of Sentinel
#comment: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Tanuki skullcrusher and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: 2nd Mark of Sentinel
#comment: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Bhato bloodspear and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Skullcrusher Amulet
#comment: The amulet that represents the Skullcrusher Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Bloodspear Amulet
#comment: The amulet that represents the Bloodspear Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Red Sunset Sword
#comment: A sword used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan.

name: Esrandell's Letter
#comment: Esrandell's introduction

name: Kendell's Letter
#comment: Kendell's letter

name: 1st Onyx Talisman
#comment: A necklace crafted of onyx. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: 2nd Onyx Talisman
#comment: A necklace crafted of onyx. Recover the original scrolls from the blackskull Orcs and bring them to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Scroll
#comment: An ancient scroll called Kaysha's Revelation. Take it along with the clay tablet to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Clay Tablet
#comment: An ancient clay tablet engraved with text. Take it along with the ancient scroll to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Kartia's Translation
#comment: Kartia's translation of Kaysha's Revelations. Take it to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Eldritch Dagger
#comment: A steel dagger engraved with the runes of Shilen and Gran Kain.

name: Harrys's 1st Receipt
#comment: A receipt Harrys received after ordering tools. Take this and go to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Harrys's 2nd Receipt
#comment: The receipt that Harrys has received after placing an order for his tools. Go and gather golem shards needed for creating the tool.

name: Golem Shard
#comment: Shards of rock that have fallen from the golem's body. Gather five of these and take them to Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Tool Box
#comment: A toolbox containing the tools that Blacksmith Alltran has forged. Take this to Magister Harrys at the temple.

name: Delivery List
#comment: Take the heavy wooden box to Trader Jackson. The bolts of cloth to Trader Silvia. Take the clay pot to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Heavy Wood Box
#comment: The wooden box to be delivered to Trader Jackson of the weapons shop.

name: Cloth Bundle
#comment: Bolts of cloth that need to be delivered to Trader Silvia of the grocery store.

name: Clay Pot
#comment: The clay pot that must be delivered to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Jackson's Receipt
#comment: The receipt that Jackson has issued upon receiving his wooden box. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Silvia's Receipt
#comment: The receipt that Silvia has issued upon receiving her bolts of cloth. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Rant's Receipt
#comment: The receipt issued by Rant upon his receiving of the clay pot. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: official Letter
#comment: An official letter that the Lord of Gludio has sent to Sir Colin Windawood, calling a meeting. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Flame Shard
#comment: A fragment of soul ore of fire. Can be taken from the fire spirit salamander. Give it to Trader Katerina.

name: Ice Shard
#comment: A fragment of elemental stone of water. Can be taken from the water spirit undine. Give to Trader Katerina.

name: Lilith's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Lilith in longing for her lover, separated a thousand years ago. Find out news about her lover for her.

name: Theon's Diary
#comment: A diary written by Theon in longing for his lover, separated a thousand years ago. Take this to Lilith.

name: Adamantite Ore
#comment: Adamantite ore. All of it is imported from Gracia. Gather 20 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Wilford.

name: Clay Tablet
#comment: A tablet praising Beleth that the devil Nerkas possessed. Deliver this to High Priest Biotin.

name: Silvery Spidersilk
#comment: The spider silk of the silver spider. Take this to Trader Unoren of the weapons shop.

name: Unoren's Receipt
#comment: The receipt issued by the magic shop. Take this and go to Trader Creamees.

name: Creamees's Ticket
#comment: A ticket issued by the warehouse. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Julia.

name: Nightshade Leaf
#comment: The leaf of the nightshade plant. Take this to Nerupa.

name: Cracked Skull
#comment: The cracked skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Perfect Skull
#comment: Skull of the dark horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Fox Fur
#comment: A mane of keltirs. It is soft and luxurious, and used to spin thread and yarn. Take this to Cristel.

name: Fox Fur Yarn
#comment: Yarn spun out of the fur of keltirs. Take this to the former tailor Warehouse Keeper Rolfe, and he will make it into the doll's hair.

name: Maiden Doll
#comment: A doll resembling a Human maiden. Take this to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell.

name: Plague Dust
#comment: A powder obtained from the plague zombie. Take this to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Andellia's Letter
#comment: A letter from Andellia asking her sister Thalia to send her the fruit of the Mother Tree.

name: Fruit of The Mother Tree
#comment: Fruit that the Mother Tree bears once every few years. Take this to Andellia.

name: Rumiel's 1st Poem
#comment: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's first poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 2nd Poem
#comment: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's second poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 3rd Poem
#comment: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's third poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 4th Poem
#comment: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fourth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Wererat's Fang
#comment: The fang of a dead ratman. Collect these to take to Master Ellenia.

name: Varool Foulclaw's Fang
#comment: The fang of Varool Foulclaw, leader of the ratmen. Take this to Master Ellenia.

name: Kirunak Skull
#comment: Kirunak's skull obtained after killing Kirunak, the leader of the drevanuls. Take this to Trader Creamees.

name: Zombie's Skin
#comment: A skin obtained from marshland zombies. Collect five and go to Trader Minaless.

name: Nightmare Crystal
#comment: A crystal used by the succubus Merkenis to cast nightmares. Take this to Tetrarch Vellior.

name: Spellbook: Light
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Light.

name: Spellbook: Might
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Might. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Ice Bolt
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Bolt. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Battle Heal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Battle Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Vampiric Touch
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Vampiric Touch. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Flame Strike
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Flame Strike. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.

name: Spellbook: Cure Poison
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Cure Poison. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Group Heal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Group Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Curse: Poison
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Curse: Poison. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Curse: Weakness
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Curse: Weakness. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Summon Meal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Meal. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Shield
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Shield. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Know Enemy
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Know Enemy.

name: Lesser Healing Potion
#comment: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Healing Potion
#comment: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. High endurance.

name: Haste Potion
#comment: A magical potion that increases speed.

name: Tutorial Parchment
#comment: Take the tutorial parchment to Grand Master Roien.

name: Tutorial Parchment
#comment: Take the tutorial parchment to Grand Master Roien.

name: Tutorial Parchment
#comment: Take the tutorial parchment to Nerupa.

name: Tutorial Parchment
#comment: Take the tutorial parchment to Mitraell, the chief of Dark Elves.

name: Recommendation
#comment: Take the recommendation to Grand Master Roien.

name: Recommendation
#comment: Take the recommendation to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Leaf of the Mother Tree
#comment: Take the leaf of the Mother Tree to Nerupa.

name: Blood of Mitraell
#comment: Take the blood of Mitraell to Hierarch Mitraell.

name: Hyacinth Charm
#comment: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source to seek those who pollute the waters of the elven village.

name: Hyacinth Charm
#comment: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source and obtain five handfuls of plague dust from the zombies.

name: Beginner's Potion
#comment: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Boat Ticket: Talking Island to Gludin
#comment: Boat Ticket: Depart Talking Island - Arrive Gludin Harbor

name: Boat Ticket: Gludin to Talking Island
#comment: Boat Ticket: Depart Gludin Harbor - Arrive Talking Island

name: Carlon's Letter
#comment: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate Guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Dark Elf Village guild.

name: Venom Sac
#comment: A poison sac of poisonous spider. Gather ten of these and take to Astaron.

name: Wind Shard
#comment: A fragment of the elemental stone of wind. You can get them from lirein, the wind spirits. Collect these to take to Rizraell.

name: Darin's Receipt
#comment: A receipt for a magical potion Darin received after paying Baulro. This must be handed to Baulro.

name: Baulro's Potion
#comment: A potion of courage that Baulro has created for the shy Darin, but its effects are unknown. This must be delivered to Darin.

name: Omen Beast's Eye
#comment: The first of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Taint Stone
#comment: The second of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Succubus Blood
#comment: The third of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Gludio Lord's Mark
#comment: A mark indicating that the bearer is carrying out the orders of the lord. Keep this in your possession and hunt Orcs or werewolves.

name: Orc's Necklace
#comment: A bone necklace that Orc fighters possess on their bodies for magic purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Werewolf's Fang
#comment: Fangs from a dead werewolf. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Giant Spider Leg
#comment: The legs cut off from a giant spider. Collect 8 of these and take them to Alshupes.

name: Undrias's Letter
#comment: Abyssal Celebrant Undrias's letter. Take this letter to Trader Iria, Warehouse Keeper Dorankus, and Master Trudy.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
#comment: A ceremonial dagger used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Dreviant Wine
#comment: Holy wine used in the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Garmiel's Scripture
#comment: The scripture used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Arujien's Letter
#comment: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Gatekeeper Mirabel.

name: Arujien's Letter
#comment: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Trader Herbiel.

name: Arujien's Letter
#comment: Arujien's love letter. Since you have shown this to Mirabel and Herbiel, you must go back to Arujien.

name: Spellbook: Attack Aura
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Attack Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Elemental Heal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Elemental Heal. Used by Elven Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Drain Health
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Drain Health. Used by Human Knights and Dark Fighters.

name: Spellbook: Wind Walk
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Walk. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.

name: Spellbook: Wind Shackle
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Shackle. Used by Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Cotton Tunic
#comment: A tunic made of tough cotton.

name: Tunic of Magic
#comment: A tunic, comfortably designed for mages.

name: Cotton Stockings
#comment: A pair of pants made of tough cotton.

name: Stockings of Devotion
#comment: Part of the devotion set.

name: Stockings of Magic
#comment: A pair of pants, comfortably designed for mages.

name: Norman's Letter
#comment: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Gludio region guild.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: Bone fragments of the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and go back to Magister Harne.

name: Orc Amulet
#comment: An amulet possessed by Kaboo Orcs for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

name: Orc's Necklace
#comment: A bone necklace possessed by Kaboo Orc fighters for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

name: Orc Amulet
#comment: An amulet that the balor Orcs possess for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Orc's Necklace
#comment: A bone necklace that the balor Orc fighters carry for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Spore Sac
#comment: A sac containing spore pollen. Give 10 spore sacs to Herbiel.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
#comment: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
#comment: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
#comment: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
#comment: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
#comment: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Spiritbound Wand
#comment: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
#comment: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
#comment: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Auron's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Master Auron. Take this to Trader Simplon in the Town of Gludio.

name: Warrior Guild Mark
#comment: A mark that shows that player is a member of the Warrior Guild. Take this to the Ruins of Agony and kill tracker skeletons.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
#comment: An old bronze sword used by tracker skeletons. Collect ten and give them to Trader Simplon.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
#comment: An old and rusted bronze sword given by Trader Simplon, who said it was a 'Sword of Trial'.Take this to Master Auron.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
#comment: An old and rusty bronze sword called the 'Sword of Trial'. Use this to hunt poison spiders and arachnid trackers.

name: Simplon's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Trader Simplon. Take this to Master Auron.

name: Poison Spider's Leg
#comment: A cut leg of a dead poison spider or an arachnid tracker. Collect twenty of these and take to Master Auron.

name: Medallion of Warrior
#comment: Take this medallion and go to the Grand Master of the Warrior's Guild to change your occupation to a Warrior.

name: Spellbook: Wind Strike
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Strike.

name: Spellbook: Self Heal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Self Heal.

name: Spellbook: Heal
#comment: Spellbook needed to learn Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.

name: Jenna's Letter
#comment: A letter from Sentry Jenna to Master Harant.

name: Sentry Blade
#comment: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
#comment: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
#comment: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Old Bronze Sword
#comment: A bronze sword used in the past by sentries. Recover this and take it to Sentry Jenna.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment obtained from the undead skeletons. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Elf Skull
#comment: The skull of an undead Elf. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Dark Bezoar
#comment: Gather 13 dark bezoars and take them to Sentry Nelsya.

name: Sword of Ritual
#comment: Take this sword to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
#comment: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Gludio Guard's 1st Badge
#comment: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Bathia requested, hunt bugbear raiders.

name: Bugbear Necklace
#comment: A necklace worn by bugbears for incantation purposes. Collect ten of these and visit Captain Bathia.

name: Einhasad's 1st Temple Badge
#comment: As High Priest Raimund requested, go to the Ruins of Despair, defeat the departed spirits of priests, and collect 12 Einhasad crucifixes.

name: Einhasad's Crucifix
#comment: A holy symbol of Einhasad, the goddess of light. Collect 12 of these and go to High Priest Raimund.

name: Gludio Guard's 2nd Badge
#comment: The mark that distinguishes guard membership. As Captain Bezique requested, hunt giant spiders.

name: Poison Spider Leg
#comment: A severed leg of a dead poison spider. Collect twenty of these and go to Captain Bezique.

name: Einhasad's 2nd Temple Badge
#comment: As High Priest Levian requested, kill Langk lizardmen and collect the proof.

name: Lizardman's Totem
#comment: A small sculpture Langk lizardmen carry with them. Collect twenty of these and take them to High Priestess Levian.

name: Gludio Guard's 3rd Badge
#comment: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Gilbert requested, hunt giant spiders.

name: Giant Spider's Husk
#comment: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect twenty of these and take them to Captain Gilbert.

name: Einhasad's 3rd Temple Badge
#comment: As High Priest Biotin requested, hunt silent horrors in the Elven Ruins.

name: Skull of Silent Horror
#comment: The skull of a long-dead Elf. Collect 10 and take them to High Priest Biotin.

name: Bezique's Letter
#comment: Captain Bezique's letter to Neti. Find Neti in the Village of Gludin and give her the letter.

name: Neti's Bow
#comment: A favorite bow used by Neti, who was once a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces.

name: Neti's Dagger
#comment: Neti used this dagger when she was a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces.

name: Spartoi's Bones
#comment: Undead bone pieces. Collect 10 and take them to Neti.

name: Horseshoe of Light
#comment: A proof you received after passing Neti's test. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Most Wanted List
#comment: It is written that whoever does away with the Cat's Eye bandits and recovers the stolen goods will be rewarded.

name: Stolen Jewelry
#comment: A fair amount of jewelry the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take them to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Tomes
#comment: A rare tome the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Ring
#comment: An expensive necklace that the Cat's Eye bandits have stolen. You must take it back to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Necklace
#comment: An expensive necklace the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Bezique's Recommendation
#comment: Take this medallion to the Grand Masters of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Rogue.

name: 1st Letter of Order
#comment: A certificate of forbidden book collection given by Priest Zigaunt. Carry this around and collect all the forbidden books.

name: 2nd Letter of Order
#comment: A certificate that proves that you represent the religious body. This certificate is given by Priest Zigaunt. Take this to Lionel for covenant.

name: Lionel's Book
#comment: The last book of Lioniel. Hand this book to Grand Magister Gallint in the Einhovant School of Magic.

name: Book of Vivyan
#comment: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Vivyan. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Simplon
#comment: The rest of Simplon's forbidden books. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Praga
#comment: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Praga. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Certificate of Gallint
#comment: A certificate that Gallint gives for safekeeping of forbidden books. Give to Lionel and receive covenant.

name: Pendant of Mother
#comment: The pendant of his mother that Guard Praga lost in the ruins. Take this to Guard Praga and receive a forbidden book.

name: Necklace of Mother
#comment: A necklace chain where a pendant used to hang. Recover the pendant from the zombies in the Ruins of Agony to make it complete.

name: Lionel's Covenant
#comment: Lionel's pledge not to use the forbidden book again. Give it to Priest Zigaunt and receive the mark of faith.

name: Mark of Faith
#comment: Take this token to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Cleric.

name: Sorius's Letter
#comment: A letter received from Master Sorius to be given to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Kluto Box
#comment: A box that Kluto asked to give to Master Sorius.

name: Elven Knight Brooch
#comment: Take this brooch to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild and he will change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Topaz Piece
#comment: A piece of topaz obtained from the undead in the ruins. Collect 20 to take to Master Sorius.

name: Emerald Piece
#comment: A piece of emerald obtained from the Ol Mahum Novices. Collect 20 of these to take to Blacksmith Kluto.

name: Reisa's Letter
#comment: Master Reisa's letter to Guard Moretti. Find Guard Moretti and give him the letter.

name: Prias's 1st Torn Letter
#comment: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 2nd Torn Letter
#comment: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 3rd Torn Letter
#comment: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 4th Torn Letter
#comment: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Moretti's Herb
#comment: An herb that Guard Moretti asked to give to Prias.

name: Guard's Bow
#comment: A bow given by Guard Moretti. May be efficiently used for some purpose.

name: Moretti's Letter
#comment: An urgent letter from Guard Moretti to Prias.

name: Prias's Letter
#comment: A reply of Prias to the letter from Guard Moretti. Hand this to Moretti.

name: Honorary Guard
#comment: A letter written by Guard Moretti to Master Reisa. Take it to Master Reisa.

name: Reisa's Recommendation
#comment: Take this recommendation to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Scout.

name: Rosella's Letter
#comment: A letter from Rosella to Elven Magister Greenis. Related to ruby, the symbol of fire.

name: Red Down
#comment: Material needed to make ruby of magical powers. Collect 5 and take them to Magister Greenis for the magical power ruby.

name: Magical Powers Ruby
#comment: Ruby that symbolizes fire. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Pure Aquamarine
#comment: Aquamarine that symbolizes water. Gather the 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Appetizing Apple
#comment: A very ripe apple. Give it to Thalia for information on the aquamarine of water.

name: Gold Leaves
#comment: Leaves used as fertilizer for the Mother Tree. Collect five leaves and give them to Thalia for an aquamarine.

name: Immortal Love
#comment: A book Northwind wanted to borrow. If you give this book to Northwind, you can obtain information on the amethyst.

name: Amethyst
#comment: An amethyst obtained by killing sukar wererat. Give two to Northwind for nobility amethyst.

name: Nobility Amethyst
#comment: Amethyst that symbolizes wind. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Rosella's Recommendation
#comment: Rosella's recommendation. If you show this to Varsak, you can get information on the fertility peridot.

name: Peridot
#comment: A peridot you can get if you kill a sniper skeleton. If you collect 3 and show them to Varsak, you can get the fertility peridot.

name: Fertility Peridot
#comment: A peridot that symbolizes the earth. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Eternity Diamond
#comment: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Magician Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Wizard.

name: Crystal Medallion
#comment: A necklace given by Priest Manuel. Take this and go to the port Gludin to find the girl who works miracles.

name: Swindler's Money
#comment: Money from Perrin's swindling. Give it to Allana.

name: Allana's Diary
#comment: A diary with records of fraud miracle. Show this to Priest Manuel as proof.

name: Lizard Captain Order
#comment: An order of lizard captain to kidnap the sacred flame of prophecy.

name: Leaf of Oracle
#comment: Take this to the high priest to change your occupation to an Oracle.

name: Half of Diary
#comment: Half of the diary given by Allana. You must get money from Perrin and find the other half of the diary.

name: Palus Talisman
#comment: A talisman inscribed with palus runes that symbolize a deep lake. Carry this and hunt lycanthrope in the Neutral Zone.

name: Lycanthrope Skull
#comment: A skull obtained after killing lycanthrope. Collect thirteen and take them to Master Virgil.

name: Virgil's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Master Virgil. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta of the village of Gludin.

name: Morte Talisman
#comment: A talisman with inscription of rune of Morte, symbol of death. Carry this and find materials needed for coffin.

name: Predator's Carapace
#comment: The hard carapace of a poison spider. Take this and five arachnid tracker silk threads to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

name: Arachnid Tracker Silk
#comment: Arachnid tracker web threads. Take five of these and a giant poison spider carapace to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
#comment: A coffin used in funeral of Dark Elven Knight. Take this to Master Virgil.

name: Gaze of Abyss
#comment: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Shilen's Call
#comment: A letter received from Triskel. Go to Witch Arkenia of the Altar of Rites.

name: Arkenia's Letter
#comment: A letter received from Arkenia. Take this to Guard Leikan to obtain information about the thief.

name: Leikan's Note
#comment: A simple contract given by Guard Leikan. Must hunt moonstone beasts and collect their molars.

name: Moonstone Beast's Molar
#comment: A molar obtained after killing a moonstone beast. Collect 10 of these to take to Guard Leikan.

name: Leikan's Knife
#comment: A knife received as present from Leikan. They say it works well against the Calpicos.

name: Shilen's Tears
#comment: Magic liquid stolen from the Altar of Rites. Give this to Witch Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Recommendation
#comment: A token of thanks received from Arkenia. Take this to Triskel.

name: Iron Heart
#comment: Take this to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf Guild to change your occupation to an Assassin.

name: Seed of Anger
#comment: A seed obtained from Charkeren, who is full of anger. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Seed of Despair
#comment: A seed obtained from Witch Varika. You must obtain all four seeds to earn the Jewel of Darkness.

name: Seed of Horror
#comment: A seed obtained from Annika, who is full of horror. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Seed of Lunacy
#comment: A seed obtained from a lunatic. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Family's Remains
#comment: Remains of Charkeren's slain family. Find 3 and return to Charkeren.

name: Varika's Liquor
#comment: A medicine Varika made for the son of Duchess Dwell. If you give it to Duchess, you can obtain the Seed of Despair.

name: Knee Bone
#comment: The knee bone of undead that Annika was looking for. Give this to Annika to obtain the Seed of Horror.

name: Heart of Lunacy
#comment: The hearts of those who have been turned into skeletons by a sorcerer of lunacy. Collect 3 Hearts of Lunacy and take them to Arkenia.

name: Jewel of Darkness
#comment: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf guild to change your occupation to a Dark Wizard.

name: Sidra's Letter
#comment: The letter of introduction written by Magister Sidra. Take this to Magister Talbot.

name: Blank Sheet
#comment: A blank scroll. Take this and hunt dark succubus to obtain bloody runes.

name: Bloody Rune
#comment: Runes written with the blood of dark succubus. Collect 5 and take to Magister Talbot.

name: Garmiel Book
#comment: The sacred book of Gran Kain, god of darkness, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Prayer of Adonius
#comment: The widely beloved prayer book. Take this to Priest Adonius in the village of Gludin.

name: Penitent's Mark
#comment: The mark that shows one is in the course of repenting one's sins. Carry this and hunt skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair.

name: Ashen Bones
#comment: Bones from the skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair. Gather 10 and take them to Priest Adonius.

name: Andariel Book
#comment: The sacred book of Einhasad, goddess of light, written in the Elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Orb of Abyss
#comment: Take this token to a Grand Master of a Dark Elf Guild in any major city to change your occupation to a Shillien Oracle.

name: Mark of Esquire
#comment: A mark that indicates an esquire. Wander around the villages in Gludio and meet with guard captains and high priests.

name: Charm of Grain
#comment: Greenis's good luck charm. Kill pincer spiders and give 5 red down to Greenis.

name: Sap of the Mother Tree
#comment: Sap of Mother Tree that dryad elders like. Find 5 gold leaves and give them to Thalia.

name: Lucky Potpourri
#comment: Northwind's lucky potpourri. Give Northwind 2 amethysts obtained from killing sukar wererats.

name: Tamil's Necklace
#comment: Tamil's necklace. Show it to Perrin.

name: Kluto's Memo
#comment: A memo from Blacksmith Kluto asking to defeat the Ol Mahum Novices.

name: Lucky Key
#comment: A bronze key. Hunt zombies in the swamp area, collect 3 remains, and take them to Charkeren.

name: Candle

#comment: Fragrant herb potpourri. Obtain 3 Hearts of Lunacy from a skeleton scout and take them to Arkenia.

name: Key of Flame
#comment: The key that can be obtained by killing a ratman fighter. When you give it to a salamander, he will give you the token of fire.

name: Flame Earring
#comment: The token of fire given by fire spirit salamander. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

#comment: The mirror given by the Wind Sylph. Go to the lizardmen of the Wastelands and obtain the Wind Feather and return it to the Wind Sylph.

name: Wind Bangle

name: Water Necklace
#comment: The token of water given by water spirit Undine. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Rust Gold Coin

name: Red Soil
#comment: The soil obtained from killing red bear. Give to the earth snake for the token of earth.

name: Earth Ring
#comment: Token of Earth given by earth snake. Collect 4 tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Bead of Season
#comment: Take this bead to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Wizard.

name: Rusted Key
#comment: The key that unlocks Prias's shackles. Take this and go to Prias.

name: Blood Mark
#comment: An item needed to upgrade a clan to level three.

name: Ingredient List
#comment: A list of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat.

name: Sonia's Botany Book
#comment: A picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots.

name: Red Mandragora Root
#comment: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: White Mandragora Root
#comment: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: Red Mandragora Sap
#comment: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: White Mandragora Sap
#comment: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Jacob's Insect Book
#comment: A diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain nectar and royal jelly from the bloody bee or the stinger wasp.

name: Nectar
#comment: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jaycub.

name: Royal Jelly
#comment: A rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jaycub.

name: Honey
#comment: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Golden Honey
#comment: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Pano's Contract
#comment: A contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward.

name: Hobgoblin Amulet
#comment: An amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on their bodies. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano.

name: Dionian Potato
#comment: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Glyvka's Botany Book
#comment: A picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from grey ants or crimson ants.

name: Green Marsh Moss
#comment: Green marsh moss is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Brown Marsh Moss
#comment: Rare brown marsh moss, its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Green Moss Bundle
#comment: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Brown Moss Bundle
#comment: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Body of Monster Eye
#comment: Severed flesh of the dead body of monster eye. Take this to Magister Rollant.

name: Meat of Monster Eye
#comment: The dead body of a monster eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Jonas's 1st Steak Dish
#comment: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's 2nd Steak Dish
#comment: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

#comment: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

#comment: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

name: Wyrm's Tooth

#comment: A crystal of B-Grade.

#comment: A crystal of A-Grade.

#comment: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon.

name: Gludin Panacen
#comment: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Gludin Vermouth
#comment: Medicated wine from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Artemeter
#comment: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Kasha Wolf Fang
#comment: A fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain.

name: Grave Robber's Head
#comment: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect 50 to take to Seer Livina.

name: Black Soulstone
#comment: A black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Red Soulstone
#comment: A red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Maraku Werewolf Head
#comment: The head of a Maraku werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect 40 of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse.

name: Darkwing Bat Fang
#comment: A fang of a darkwing bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus.

name: Varangka's Parasite
#comment: An evil parasite that summons Varangka's trackers.

name: Kasha Parasite
#comment: A parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the gray bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit.

name: Kasha Crystal
#comment: A crystal obtained by killing the gray bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Black Wolf Pelt
#comment: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Maryse Redbonnet.

name: Goblin Necklace
#comment: A necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Goblin Pendant
#comment: A necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Goblin Lord Pendant
#comment: A necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Suspicious Memo
#comment: A suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Suspicious Contract
#comment: A suspicious contract completed by collecting suspicious memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Scale Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons.

name: Chrysolite Ore
#comment: Chrysolite Ore received from defeating Utuku Orcs. Collect these and take them to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Torn Map Fragment
#comment: A part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Collect 4 of these pieces to complete the map.

name: Hidden Ore Map
#comment: A map that reveals a hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Bat Fang
#comment: A fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Bronze Key's Keef

name: Floating Stone
#comment: A stone that floats on water. Obtain it from a magical weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Tarantula Spider Silk
#comment: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion.

name: Tarantula Spinnerette
#comment: A pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan.

name: Giant Spider Skin

name: Amulet: Chill Flame
#comment: Amulet required for the Chill Flame spell. Used by Orc Mystics.

name: Amulet: Blaze Quake
#comment: Amulet required for the Blaze Quake spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Aura Sink
#comment: Amulet required for the Aura Sink spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Madness
#comment: Amulet required for the Madness spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Frost Flame
#comment: An amulet that is needed for the Frost Flame spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Seal of Binding
#comment: Amulet required for the Seal of Binding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Amulet: Seal of Poison
#comment: Amulet required for the Seal of Poison spell. Used by Orc Shamans.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
#comment: A magical scroll that relocates you to the nearest village

name: Greater Healing Potion
#comment: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Quick Healing Potion
#comment: A magical potion that quickly restores HP.

name: Honey Khandar
#comment: A miraculous medicine made of the mixture of honey and khandar extract. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bear Fur Cloak
#comment: A cloak made of grizzly bear's fur. Excellent for keeping warm. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bloody Axe
#comment: An axe that holds the blood of wild animals. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Ancestor Skull
#comment: A skull of an ancestor of Urutus. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Spider Dust
#comment: A grain of powder made of dried legs of poisonous spiders. Smelling it will make you feel refreshed. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Deep Sea Orb
#comment: A pearl brought out of a deep sea. It is said to help predict the future. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bolter's List
#comment: The list of things that Bolter wants you to bring from the village.

name: Mining Boots
#comment: A pair of mining boots you got from Trader Garita. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Miner's Pick
#comment: A miner's pick you got from Blacksmith Brunon. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Boomboom Powder
#comment: A sack of boomboom powder you got from Trader Shari. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Redstone Beer
#comment: Delicious beer you got from Warehouse Chief Reed. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
#comment: A pair of socks that Miner Bolter gave you. For what...?

name: Hatos's 1st Order
#comment: The order to kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's 2nd Order
#comment: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's 3rd Order
#comment: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Dark Elf
#comment: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Dark Elven Magister Kaland. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Human
#comment: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Duke Van Halter. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Elf
#comment: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Elven Master Laria. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Gouph's Contract
#comment: Collector Gouph drew up this contract when buying the star diamond from Trader Reep. Take this to Trader Reep.

name: Reep's Contract
#comment: Trader Reep drew up this contract when he requested the delivery of the star diamond. Take this to Carrier Torocco.

name: Elven Wine
#comment: Carrier Torocco bought this high quality wine to give it to his old friend, Maron, as a present. Take this to Miner Maron.

name: Brunon's Dice
#comment: These dice were specially made for gambling. Take these to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Contract
#comment: This contract says if Brunon gets the 20 stolen jewels back from goblins, he can get the star diamond back.

name: Aquamarine
#comment: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Chrysoberyl
#comment: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Gem Box
#comment: Blacksmith Brunon gives this gem box. Take it to Collector Gouph.

name: Coal Piece
#comment: This coal piece is in the gem box. Take this to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Letter
#comment: Blacksmith Brunon sends this letter to Warehouse Keeper Murdoc asking for the right box.

name: Berry Tart
#comment: Sweet strawberry-flavored tart. Warehouse Keeper Murdoc sends this to Warehouse Keeper Airy as a present of apology.

name: Bat Diagram
#comment: This diagram shows the blade bat in details. Take this and go hunt blade bats to obtain the star diamond.

name: Star Diamond
#comment: Everyone is looking for this diamond. Take this to the real owner.

name: Starstone
#comment: A mineral collected from the destroyed greystone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Tamil.

name: Starstone
#comment: A mineral obtained by defeated whinstone golems. Collect twenty and take them to Gatekeeper Wirphy.

name: Mirien's Review
#comment: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this and go to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
#comment: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
#comment: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
#comment: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Green Blood
#comment: Goblin's blood. If you have enough of this item, the Kuruka ratman leader appears.

name: Goblin Dwelling Map
#comment: A map showing goblins' dwelling. Take this and find the goblin tribes and destroy them.

name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
#comment: A tooth obtained after killing Kuruka ratman leader. Collect ten of these to take to Prefect Karukia.

name: Betrayer's Report
#comment: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
#comment: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Head of Betrayer
#comment: The head of a traitor orc. Collect 2 and take them to Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village.

name: Mark of Raider
#comment: A necklace given to an Orc who has earned the qualification to become an Orc Raider. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Raider.

name: Pomegranate
#comment: A red pomegranate fruit given by Gantaki. Take this and go to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: 1st Leather Pouch
#comment: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this and hunt kasha bears and collect 5 of their claws.

name: 2nd Leather Pouch
#comment: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Hunt kasha blade spiders with this and collect 5 talons.

name: 3rd Leather Pouch
#comment: A leather pouch Khavatari Rosheek gave you. Take this while hunting scarlet salamanders to obtain 5 of their scales.

name: 1st Leather Pouch (Full)
#comment: A pouch that contains 5 kasha bear claws. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: 2nd Leather Pouch (Full)
#comment: A pouch that contains 5 pincers of kasha blade spider talon. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: 3rd Leather Pouch (Full)
#comment: A pouch that contains 5 scales from the scarlet salamander. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Kasha Bear Claw
#comment: A claw pulled out from a kasha bear after killing it. Collect 5 of these.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
#comment: A talon pulled out from a kasha blade spider after killing it. Collect 5 of these.

name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
#comment: A scale of a scarlet salamander. Collect 5 of these.

name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
#comment: The first scroll containing secret of kabart, the Orcs' traditional martial arts.

name: Rosheek's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this to Gantaki Zu Urutu.

name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
#comment: Gantaki's letter of recommendation. Receive the help of Gatekeeper Tamil and take this recommendation to Prefect Kasman in the Village of Gludin.

name: Fig
#comment: A fig given by Prefect Kasman. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

name: 4th Leather Pouch
#comment: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Toruku. Take this, kill fighters of various races and collect 12 tokens.

name: 4th Leather Pouch (Full)
#comment: A full pouch of 12 tokens after killing fighters of various races. Take this to Khavatari Toruku.

name: Vuku Orc Tusk
#comment: A tusk obtained after killing a vuku Orc. Gather 3 of these.

name: Ratman Fang
#comment: A fang from a dead ratman fighter. Gather 3 of these.

name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
#comment: A tooth obtained after killing a Langk lizardman. Gather 3 of these.

name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
#comment: A tooth obtained after killing the Felim lizardman. Gather 3 of these.

name: Iron Will Scroll
#comment: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart.

name: Toruku's Letter
#comment: A letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman.

name: Khavatari Totem
#comment: A token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc Monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Monk.

name: Fire Charm
#comment: A charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the 3 items that Tataru spoke of.

name: Kasha Bear Pelt
#comment: A pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
#comment: The husk of a kasha blade spider. Take it to Tataru, along with a kasha bear pelt and a fiery egg.

name: 1st Fiery Egg
#comment: A spirit egg obtained from a scarlet salamander. Take it to Tataru along with a kasha bear pelt and a kasha bladespider husk.

name: Hestui Mask
#comment: A mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui totem spirit.

name: 2nd Fiery Egg
#comment: A spirit egg received from a scarlet salamander. Take this to the Hestui totem spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Claw
#comment: A claw received from Hestui totem spirit. Take this and go to Tataru.

name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
#comment: A letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the town of Gludin.

name: Flame Charm
#comment: A charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos.

name: Grizzly Blood
#comment: A glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather 3 and take to Seer Umos.

name: Blood Cauldron
#comment: A cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

name: Spirit Net
#comment: A net made with spirit's spider silk. Use this to capture durka spirit hidden inside poison spiders.

name: Bound Durka Spirit
#comment: Durka spirit bound inside spirit net. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit.

name: Durka Parasite
#comment: An evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Blood
#comment: Blood spilt by the Duda-Mara totem spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos.

name: Mask of Medium
#comment: A token that shows one has the qualifications to become an Orc Shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc Shaman.

name: Silvera's Ring
#comment: A ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down the boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth.

name: 1st Pass Certificate
#comment: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin.

name: 2nd Pass Certificate
#comment: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin.

name: Final Pass Certificate
#comment: The certificate for passing the final Artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an Artisan.

name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
#comment: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Tooth
#comment: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink makes you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Kluto's Letter
#comment: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio.

name: Footprint of Thief
#comment: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Stolen Secret Box
#comment: A secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Secret Box
#comment: A secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Ring of Raven
#comment: A mark certifying that one has earned the right to become a Scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to Scavenger.

name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
#comment: A letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
#comment: An order sheet given by Warehouse Freightman Raut. Give it to Torai, in the south of Death Pass.

name: Succubus Undies
#comment: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin.

name: Mion's Letter
#comment: A letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma.

name: Bronk's Ingot
#comment: An ingot to be given to Chief Blacksmith Bronk.

name: Shari's Axe
#comment: An axe to be given to Trader Shari.

name: Zimenf's Potion
#comment: A potion to give to Priest of the Earth Zimenf.

name: Shari's Pay
#comment: Product cost given by Shari. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Zimenf's Pay
#comment: Product cost given by Zimenf. Take this to Trader Mion.

name: Honey Jar

name: Bead
#comment: A bead obtained from tarantula. Gather 20 of these and give to Master Toma.

name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
#comment: A scroll that relocates you to your clan hall. If you don't have a clan hall, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
#comment: A scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Antidote
#comment: A reagent that neutralizes poison.

name: Greater Antidote
#comment: A high-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful poison.

name: Bandage
#comment: A medical bandage that stops bleeding when injured.

name: Emergency Dressing
#comment: A medical bandage that stops bleeding fast when severely injured.

name: Soulshot: No Grade
#comment: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No grade weapon.

name: Kendell's 1st Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Uoph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 2nd Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 3rd Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Batoh. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves.

name: Kendell's 4th Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven Village.

name: Kendell's 5th Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 6th Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Roko. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 7th Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Kamut. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, south of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's 8th Order
#comment: Punish Kaboo Chief Murtika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris.

name: Kaboo Chief's 1st Torque

name: Kaboo Chief's 2nd Torque
