name: Mark of Challenger
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Kash
#comment: Kash's introduction letter. Take this letter to Martien in Giran Castle Town.

name: Watcher's 1st Eye
#comment: An item obtained from the monster, Gorr. Take this to Martien in Giran Castle Town.

name: Watcher's 2nd Eye
#comment: An item obtained from the monster, Baraham. Show this to Raldo and...

name: Scroll of Shyslassys
#comment: An ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassys. Take this to Kash in the Town of Dion.

name: Broken Key
#comment: A key obtained by slaying Shyslassys. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassys.

name: Mark of Duty
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. An item for occupational change.

name: Letter of Dustin
#comment: A letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grand Master Hannavalt in Giran Castle Town.

name: Knights Tear
#comment: Obtained from the spirit of Sir Herod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford.

name: Mirror of Orpic
#comment: This is needed in order to speak with the ghost of Sir Talianus. Use this to defeat the hangman tree.

name: Tear of Confession
#comment: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk.

name: Report Piece
#comment: You may obtain this by hunting strains and ghouls. Gather 10 pieces and put them together to create Talianus's report.

name: Report Piece
#comment: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk, deliver the report to the ghost of Sir Talianus.

name: Tear of Loyalty
#comment: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow. Take it to Priest Dustin.

name: Militas Article
#comment: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto lizardman. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Saints Ashes Urn
#comment: An object received from Priest Dustin. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Athebaldt's Skull
#comment: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's shin.

name: Athebaldt's Ribs
#comment: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's skull and Athebaldt's shin.

name: Athebaldt's Shin
#comment: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's skull.

name: Letter of Windawood
#comment: A letter received from Sir Colin Windawood. Show this to Priest Dustin.

name: Dufners Letter
#comment: A letter sent from Master Dufner to Master Terry in the Town of Dion.

name: Terry's 1st Order
#comment: Investigate the neer ghoul berserkers of the Execution Grounds.

name: Terry's 2nd Order
#comment: Investigate the ol mahum captain, Turek orc warlord, ant captain and Turak bugbear warrior.

name: Terry's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Master Terry to Trader Viktor of Hunters Village.

name: Viktor's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry in the Town of Dion. The letter has Terry's seal.

name: Hawkeye's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village.

name: Mysterious Runestone
#comment: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying neer ghoul berserkers. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ol Mahum Runestone
#comment: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the ol mahum captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turek Runestone
#comment: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Turek orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Ant Runestone
#comment: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Turak Bugbear Runestone
#comment: A mysterious runestone obtained after slaying the Turak bugbear warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Box
#comment: A chest containing the mysterious runestones. Take this to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village.

name: Viktor's Request
#comment: A request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please gather 10 medusa scales."

name: Medusa Scales
#comment: The scales of the medusa. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Viktor.

name: Shilen's Runestone
#comment: Strange runestones obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the goddess of death.

name: Analysis Request
#comment: A request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Trader Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the dark bezoar.

name: Marina's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Brunon of the Dwarven Village.

name: Experiment Tools
#comment: Experimental tools crafted by Blacksmith Brunon. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower.

name: Analysis Result
#comment: A document where Magister Marina has organized the analyzed results of the Dark Bezoar. Deliver this to Master Terry in the Town of Dion.

name: Terry's 3rd Order
#comment: Master Terry's orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: List of Host
#comment: A list of the bezoar hosts."Marsh stakato drone, Breka orc overlord, ant warrior captain, Leto lizardman warrior"

name: Abyss Runestone
#comment: The dark bezoar retrieved from the body of a marsh stakato drone. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone
#comment: The runestone retrieved from the body of the Breka orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone
#comment: The runestone retrieved from the body of the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone
#comment: The runestone retrieved from the body of the Leto lizardman warrior. Take this to Master Terry.

name: Terry's Report
#comment: A report detailing information about the runestone incident. Take this to Master Dufner of Giran Castle Town.

name: Mark of Seeker
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Scholar
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. An occupation change related item.

name: Mirien's 1st Sigil
#comment: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain's request.

name: Mirien's 2nd Sigil
#comment: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Grand Magister Jurek's request.

name: Mirien's 3rd Sigil
#comment: A mark given by Magister Mirien when giving orders to complete Elder Cronos's request.

name: Mirien's Instruction
#comment: A note that contains Magister Mirien's instructions. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36.

name: Maria's 1st Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Maria to Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion.

name: Maria's 2nd Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Maria to Astrologer Creta of the village of Floran.

name: Lucas's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion to Maria.

name: Lucilla's Handbag
#comment: The handbag left by Maria's friend Lucillas on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta.

name: Creta's 1st Letter
#comment: A letter sent by the Astrologer Creta to Maria in the Town of Dion.

name: Creta's Painting1
#comment: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Maria.

name: Creta's Painting2
#comment: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas.

name: Creta's Painting3
#comment: A painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto lizardman warrior.

name: Brown Scroll Scrap
#comment: A scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the crystal of purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Maria.

name: Crystal of Purity
#comment: A crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion.

name: High Priest's Sigil
#comment: A mark received from High Priest Sylvain. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest.

name: Grand Magister's Sigil
#comment: A mark received from Grand Magister Jurek. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister.

name: Crono's Sigil
#comment: A mark received from Elder Cronos. This signifies proof that someone is carrying out orders from Elder Cronos.

name: Sylvain's Letter
#comment: High Priest Sylvain's letter. Take this to Maria in the Town of Dion.

name: Symbol of Sylvain
#comment: A symbol given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Jurek's List
#comment: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate: Monster eye destroyer, Breka orc shaman, and shackle.

name: Monster Eye Destroyer Skin
#comment: A beamer's skin. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Giran Castle Town.

name: Shaman's Necklace
#comment: A Breka orc shaman's necklace. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Giran Castle Town.

name: Shackle's Scalp
#comment: Skin of the shackle's head. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Giran Castle Town.

name: Symbol of Jurek
#comment: A symbol given to those who have passed Grand Magister Jurek's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Cronos Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Elder Cronos to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

name: Dieter's Key
#comment: A key to the chest where Dieter has hidden the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village.

name: Creta's 2nd Letter
#comment: Creta's letter describing the theft of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran.

name: Dieter's Letter
#comment: A letter from Magister Dieter to Trader Edroc of the weapons shop of Hunters Village.

name: Dieter's Diary
#comment: Magister Dieter's Diary, given by him in hopes that it may be of aid in recovering the Scriptures of Knowledge.

name: Raut's Letter Envelope
#comment: A plain letter envelope with no contents. The envelope is addressed "To Warehouse Keeper Raut".

name: Triff's Ring
#comment: A ring given by Drunkard Triff. Show this ring to those whom Triff has entrusted with the Scriptures of Knowledge.

name: Scripture Chapter 1
#comment: The 1st book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 2
#comment: The 2nd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 3
#comment: The 3rd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 4
#comment: The 4th book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books.

name: Valkon's Request
#comment: Warehouse Keeper Valkon's request. The instructions are to bring back the crystal of purity.

name: Poitan's Notes
#comment: Blacksmith Poitan's accounting books. Take this to Elder Casian of the Wastelands.

name: Scriptures of Knowledge
#comment: A scripture edited by Elder Cronos. It is said to contain a vast knowledge of the past. It is part of a 4-scripture set.

name: Strong Liquor
#comment: As its name indicates, a strong liquor. Take this to Drunkard Triff at the harbor.

name: Crystal of Purity
#comment: An item that Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Giran Castle Town agreed to trade with you for scripture chapter 2.

name: Casian's List
#comment: 10 ghoul's skins, 12 units of medusa's blood, 5 units of fettered soul's ichor, and 5 enchanted gargoyle's nails.

name: Ghoul's Skin
#comment: The skin of a ghoul. Gather 10 of these and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Medusa's Blood
#comment: Medusa's Blood. Gather 12 bottles and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Fettered Soul's Ichor
#comment: The ichor of a fettered soul. Gather 5 units and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail
#comment: The enchanted nails of a gargoyle. Gather 5 of these and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Symbol of Cronos
#comment: The mark of Cronos, the top sage of the continent. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion.

name: Mark of Pilgrim
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Pilgrim. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Sage
#comment: A book received from Elder Casian. Take this book to Hermit Santiago.

name: Voucher of Trial
#comment: A mark given by Hermit Santiago. Show this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Spirit of Flame
#comment: Proof that you have an understanding of the spirit of flame. In order to carry out the next stage of this trial, go see Gauri Twinklerock of Dwarven Village.

name: Essence of Flame
#comment: A jewel obtained from the lava salamander. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus.

name: Book of Gerald
#comment: A book given by Priest Gerald. The book looks very cheap.

name: Gray Badge
#comment: A badge given by Wanderer Dorf. Take this to Priest Primos at Giran Castle Town.

name: Picture of Nahir
#comment: A picture of the monster, Nahir. Defeat Nahir, who lurks in the depths of the Elven Ruins on Talking Island.

name: Hair of Nahir
#comment: The hair of the monster, Nahir. Take this to Priest Petron.

name: Statue of Einhasad
#comment: A statue of Einhasad given by Priest Petron. Take this to Andellia, who lives near the Mother Tree Glade in the Elven Village.

name: Book of Darkness
#comment: A book given by Uruha. The book contains unrecognizable letters written in blood.

name: Debris of Willow
#comment: Debris obtained from the black willow. Go and seek Uruha while in possession of this.

name: Tag of Rumor
#comment: This contains rumors regarding Wanderer Dorf and Priest Gerald.

name: Mark of Trust
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Trust. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter to Elf
#comment: A letter requesting the trust of the Elves. Deliver this to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Letter to Darkelf
#comment: A letter requesting the trust of the Dark Elves. Deliver this to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elf Village.

name: Letter to Dwarf
#comment: A letter requesting the trust of the Dwarves. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Dwarven Village.

name: Letter to Orc
#comment: A letter requesting the trust of the Orcs. Deliver this to the Pa'agrio Lord Kakai at the Orc Village.

name: Letter to Seresin
#comment: A letter given by High Priest Hollint. Deliver this to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren.

name: Scroll of Dark Elf Trust
#comment: A scroll given by Tetrarch Thifiell. Deliver this, along with the scroll of the Elf trust, to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Elf Trust
#comment: This item can be obtained from Hierarch Asterios. Give this item along with scroll of Dark Elf trust to High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
#comment: A scroll given by Lockrin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Orc trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Scroll of Orc Trust
#comment: A scroll given by Kakai, Lord of Flame. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Dwarf trust, to Cardinal Seresin.

name: Recommendation of Hollint
#comment: Deliver this to High Priest Biotin at the Temple of Einhasad on Talking Island.

name: Order of Asterios
#comment: Slay Luell of Zephyr Winds and Actea of Verdant Wilds and bring back proof of their deaths.

name: Breath of Winds
#comment: Obtained from Luell of Zephyr Winds. Deliver this, along with the seed of verdure to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Seed of Verdure
#comment: A proof obtained from Actea of Verdant Wilds. Deliver this, along with the breath of winds, to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Letter from Thifiell
#comment: Deliver this to Magister Clayton, member of the Dark Elf Guild, in the Town of Dion.

name: Blood of Guardian Basilisk
#comment: This item can be obtained from a guardian basilisk. Collect 10 of them and create basilisk Plasma.

name: Giant Aphid
#comment: This may be obtained from various soldier ants. Gather 10 to create the honey dew.

name: Stakatos Fluids
#comment: This may be obtained from various marsh stakatos. Gather 10 to create stakato ichor.

name: Basilisk Plasma
#comment: Take this, along with the honey dew and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Honey Dew
#comment: Take this, along with the basilisk plasma and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton.

name: Stakato Ichor
#comment: Take this, along with the honey dew and basilisk plasma, to Magister Clayton.

name: Order of Clayton
#comment: Obtain basilisk plasma of a guardian basilisk, stakato ichor of a marsh stakato and honey dew of an ant guard and take them to Magister Clayton.

name: Parasite of Lota
#comment: This may be obtained from the windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Seer Manakia.

name: Letter to Manakia
#comment: A letter received from Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Deliver this to Seer Manakia in the Town of Giran.

name: Letter of Manakia
#comment: A letter received from Seer Manakia. Deliver this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Letter to Nikola
#comment: A letter received from Lockrin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Order of Nikola
#comment: Obtain 10 porta heartstones and take them to Maestro Nikola.

name: Heartstone of Porta
#comment: This may be obtained from a porta. Gather 10 of these and take them to Maestro Nikola.

name: Mark of Duelist
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Duelist. An item for occupational change.

name: Order Gludio
#comment: Kill at least 10 punchers and 10 noble ant leaders in Gludio.

name: Order Dion
#comment: Kill at least 10 marsh stakato drones and 10 dead seekers in Dion.

name: Order Giran
#comment: Kill at least 10 Breka orc overlords and 10 fettered souls in Giran.

name: Order Oren
#comment: Kill at least 10 Leto lizardman overlords and 10 enchanted monster eyes in Oren.

name: Order Aden
#comment: Kill at least 10 Tamlin orcs and 10 Tamlin orc archers in Aden.

name: Puncher's Shard
#comment: A shard of the broken puncher. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Noble Ant's Feeler
#comment: The feelers of the noble ant leader. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Drone's Chitin
#comment: The chitin of the marsh stakato drone. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Dead Seeker Fang
#comment: The fangs of the dead seeker bat. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Overlord Necklace
#comment: Collect ten Breka orc overlord's necklaces and take them to Duelist Kaien.

name: Fettered Soul's Chain
#comment: The chains that surround a fettered soul's body. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Chief's Amulet
#comment: The amulet of a Leto lizardman overlord. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Enchanted Eye Meat
#comment: The flesh of an enchanted eye. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Ring
#comment: The ring of a Tamrin orc. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Arrow
#comment: The arrows of a Tamrin orc archer. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Final Order
#comment: Defeat the Excuro and Krator of the Cruma Tower, the Grandis of Giran, the Timak Orc Overlord of Oren, and the Lakin of Aden 3 times.

name: Excuro's Skin
#comment: The skin of the excuro. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Krator's Shard
#comment: The shard of a broken krator. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Grandi's Skin
#comment: The skin of a grandis. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Timak Orc's Belt
#comment: The belt of a Timak orc overlord. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Lakin's Mace
#comment: Mace used by a lakin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien.

name: Luther's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Master Luther. Take this to Alex of the village of Floran.

name: Alex's Warrant
#comment: A warrant written by Alex. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's 1st Order
#comment: A list of orders given by Leirynn. "Slay 10 Delu Shamans and bring back their tokens."

name: Delu Totem
#comment: The totem of Shaman Saska. Take this, along with the rest of the Delu Shaman totems, to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's 2nd Order
#comment: A list of orders given by Leirynn. Slay Delu chief Kalkis and bring back proof.

name: Chief Kalki's Fang
#comment: Proof that the Delu chief Kalkis has been slain. Take this to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Report
#comment: A report issued by Leirynn. Take this to Alex.

name: Strange Map
#comment: A strange map obtained from the Delu chief Kalkis.

name: Lambert's Map
#comment: A map where the name of Lambert, the former lord's guard, is written.

name: Alex's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Alex. Take this and go to drunkard Borys at the Town of Gludio.

name: Alex's Order
#comment: Alex's orders. The orders give instructions to find and recover Duke Ashton's missing gold.

name: Wine Catalog
#comment: A list of premium wine published by the Giran Traders' Guild. Show this to Trader Tyra.

name: Tyra's Contract
#comment: The contract that Trader Tyra has drawn up. The contract states that Tyra will trade 10 pouches of red spore dust for a Malrukian wine.

name: Red Spore Dust
#comment: Red spore dust obtained by slaying the giant fungus. Gather 10 pouches and bring them to Trader Tyra.

name: Malrukian Wine
#comment: Premium wine crafted following the methods of the Malruk tribe. Take this to drunkard Borys.

name: Old Order
#comment: An old order received from drunkard Borys. Take this and go to bodyguard Jax.

name: Jax's Diary
#comment: A diary that bodyguard Jax has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel's maps.

name: 1st Torn Map Piece
#comment: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Solt. Gather 4 of these.

name: 2nd Torn Map Piece
#comment: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Makel. Gather 4 of these.

name: Solt's Map
#comment: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Solt is written.

name: Makel's Map
#comment: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Makel is written.

name: Combined Map
#comment: Using the map (alt-m), find the hiding place of the lord's gold bar.

name: Rusted Key
#comment: A rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map.

name: Gold Bar
#comment: A gold bar stamped with Duke Ashton's seal. Take this to Alex.

name: Alex's Recommend
#comment: A recommendation written by Alex. Take this to Master Luther.

name: Mark of Searcher
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. An occupation change related item.

name: Report of Perrin
#comment: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor.

name: Kristina's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Saint Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius.

name: Picture of Windy
#comment: A picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy.

name: Golden Statue
#comment: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?

name: Windy's Pebbles
#comment: A pebble that Windy has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Gupu, the head of the orphanage near Gludio.

name: Order of Sorius
#comment: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks.

name: 1st Secret Letter
#comment: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 2nd Secret Letter
#comment: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 3rd Secret Letter
#comment: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: 4th Secret Letter
#comment: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina.

name: Mark of Healer
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. An occupation change related item.

name: Mark of Reformer
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. An occupation change related item.

name: Book of Reform
#comment: A book received from Priestess Pupina. Go to the Execution Grounds and slay the nameless undeads with the power of light.

name: Letter of Introduction
#comment: A letter introducing Priestess Pupina. Take this and meet with to Preacher Sla of the Wastelands.

name: Sla's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone.

name: Greetings
#comment: A letter sent by Sla to her disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order.

name: Ol Mahum's Money
#comment: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows.

name: Katari's Letter
#comment: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Nyakuri's Letter
#comment: Nyakuri's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla.

name: Undead List
#comment: Skeleton archer, skeleton lord, skeleton marksman, misery skeleton, silent horror.

name: Ramus's Letter
#comment: A reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla's disciples.

name: Ripped Diary
#comment: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect 7 of them.

name: Huge Nail
#comment: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune's skull. Take this to Priestess Pupina at Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Betrayer
#comment: A letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari in the swamp area of the Dark Forest.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: Bone pieces of a silent horror. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment of a skeleton lord. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment of a skeleton marksman. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment from a misery skeleton. Take it along with other bone fragments of the undead to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment of a skeleton archer. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment
#comment: A bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus.

name: Mark of Magus
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. An item for occupational change.

name: Rukal's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Village of Gludin.

name: Parina's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Parina to Elder Casian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the singing flower.

name: Lilac Charm
#comment: A protection charm created by Elder Casian. Take this and seek out the 3 types of singing flowers.

name: 1st Golden Seed
#comment: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: 2nd Golden Seed
#comment: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: 3rd Golden Seed
#comment: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal.

name: Score of Elements
#comment: A music score sheet given by Bard Rukal. Take this and find the 4 elemental tones.

name: Dazzling Drop
#comment: A dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine.

name: Flame Crystal
#comment: A crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander.

name: Harpy's Feather
#comment: The feather of a slain harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Wyrm's Wingbone
#comment: The wingbone of a slain wyrm. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Windsus Mane
#comment: The mane of a slain windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph.

name: Enchanted Monster Eye Shell
#comment: The skin of a slain enchanted eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Enchanted Stone Golem Powder
#comment: Stone powder obtained after slaying an enchanted stone golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Enchanted Iron Golem Scrap
#comment: A fragment of a destroyed enchanted iron golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake.

name: Tone of Water
#comment: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the 4 elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Fire
#comment: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Wind
#comment: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Tone of Earth
#comment: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion.

name: Salamander Charm
#comment: A charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the tone of fire in return for 5 flame crystals.

name: Sylph Charm
#comment: A charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the tone of wind in return for materials gathered from the harpy, wyrm, and windsus.

name: Undine Charm
#comment: A charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the tone of water in return for 20 dazzling drops.

name: Serpent Charm
#comment: A charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the tone of earth in return for slaying the enchanted monsters in the surroundings of the Ivory Tower.

name: Recommendation of Balanki
#comment: A recommendation given by Silver Scale's Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: Recommendation of Filaur
#comment: A recommendation given by Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Gather all 3 recommendations and seek out Lockirin of the Iron Gate.

name: Recommendation of Arin
#comment: A recommendation given by Black Anvil's Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: Mark of Maestro
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. An occupation change related item.

name: Letter of Solder Detachment
#comment: A letter from Captain Croto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: Paint of Kamuru
#comment: A painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the orc kingdom to seek him out.

name: Necklace of Kamuru
#comment: A necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to Captain Croto.

name: Paint of Teleport Device
#comment: A drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma.

name: Teleport Device
#comment: A teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Architecture of Cruma
#comment: A simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower.

name: Report of Cruma
#comment: A report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma reasearch team. Deliver this to Eldar Filaur.

name: Ingredients of Antidote
#comment: Gather 10 stinger wasp needles, 10 marsh spider webs, and 10 leech bloods and deliver them to Researcher Lorain.

name: Stinger Wasp Needle
#comment: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Marsh Spider's Web
#comment: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Blood of Leech
#comment: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain.

name: Mark of Warspirit
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. An item for occupational change.

name: Vendetta Totem
#comment: A totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Head
#comment: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak.

name: Warspirit Totem
#comment: A totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Orim's Contract
#comment: I will give you Braki's remains in return for 10 porta eyes, 10 excuro scales and 10 mordeo talons.

name: Porta's Eye
#comment: A jewel pried from the porta's eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Excuro's Scale
#comment: The scales of an excuro. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Mordeos Talon
#comment: The talons of a mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Braki's Remains
#comment: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Pekiron's Totem
#comment: A guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto lizardman shamans and chiefs to recover Tonar's remains.

name: Tonar's Skull
#comment: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Rib Bone
#comment: The rib bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Spine
#comment: The spine bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Arm Bone
#comment: The arm bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Thigh Bone
#comment: The thigh bones of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Remains
#comment: The remains of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heros' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Manakia's Totem
#comment: A totem received from Seer Manakia. Take this and go to the medusas and Stenoa, the gorgon queen, to recover Hermodt's remains.

name: Hermodt's Skull
#comment: The skull of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Rib Bone
#comment: The rib bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Spine
#comment: The spine bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Arm Bone
#comment: The arm bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Thigh Bone
#comment: The thigh bones of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Remains
#comment: The remains of Hermodt, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other three heros' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Racoy's Totem
#comment: A totem given by Seer Racoy. Take this and go to the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio to ask about Kiruna.

name: Vivyan's Letter
#comment: A letter from Priestess Vivyan. Take this to Trader Sarien of the Southern Wastelands.

name: Insect Diagram Book
#comment: An insect encyclopedia that Trader Sarien has given as aid. Take this and hunt noble ants to recover Kiruna's remains.

name: Kiruna's Skull
#comment: The skull of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Rib Bone
#comment: The rib bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Spine
#comment: The spine bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Arm Bone
#comment: The arm bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Thigh Bone
#comment: The thigh bones of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Remains
#comment: The remains of Kiruna, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the other 3 heros' remains, to Seer Somak.

name: Braki's Remains
#comment: The remains of the hero, Braki, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Tonar's Remains
#comment: The remains of the hero, Tonar, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Hermodt's Remains
#comment: The remains of the hero, Hermodt, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Kiruna's Remains
#comment: The remains of the hero, Kiruna, encased in an urn. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.

name: Old Knight Sword
#comment: Use this sword to deliver the final blow to the spirit of Sir Herod.

name: Broken Teleport Device
#comment: The teleport device given by Master Toma. Take this back to Master Toma.

name: Ring of Binding Gemstone
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make a Ring of Binding. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Mithril Scale Gaiters Material
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make Mithril Scale Gaiters. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Brigandine Gaiters Material
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make Brigandine Gaiters. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Elven Mithril Tunic Pattern
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make an Elven Mithril Tunic. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Elven Mithril Stockings Pattern
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make Elven Mithril Stockings. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Brigandine Helmet Design
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make a Brigandine Helmet. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Manticore Skin Boot Lining
#comment: A key material for Dwarves to make Manticore Skin Boots. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Brigandine Boots Design

#comment: Mithril key recovered from Breka orcs. Collect 30 and take them to Blacksmith Duning.

name: Norman's List
#comment: Ingredient list of Warehouse Keeper Norman: 70 units of gray bone powder, 70 granite whetstones, 70 units of red pigment, and 70 units of braided yarn.

name: Gray Bone Powder
#comment: The powder collected from the bones of ghouls and strains. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Granite Whetstone
#comment: A whetstone made from the fragments of the granite golem. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Red Pigment
#comment: Red pigment obtained by slaying the dead seeker bat. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Braided Yarn
#comment: Braided yarn obtained by slaying the silenos. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman.

name: Journeyman Gem
#comment: A material used to make the journeyman's ring.

name: Pinter's Instructions
#comment: Instructions of Blacksmith Pinter: Find and bring back 70 amber beads.

name: Amber Bead
#comment: A bead-shaped piece of amber. Collect 70 of these and take them to Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Amber Lump
#comment: An unrefined lump of amber. The material used in creating the Amber Bead.

name: Journeyman Deco Beads
#comment: Ingredient item used to make a journeyman's ring.

name: Journeyman Ring
#comment: To pass the Trial of the Guildsman, you must create 7 of these rings. Take the completed rings to Warehouse Keeper Valkon.

name: Mark of Life
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Life. An occupation change related item.

name: Cardien's Letter
#comment: Letter by Master Cardien. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village.

name: Camomile Charm
#comment: A talisman given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and return to Master Cardien in the Town of Dion.

name: Hierarch's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and go to Thalia, who lives on the eastern shores of Iris Lake.

name: Moonflower Charm
#comment: The charm given by Hierarch Asterios to keep in possession while searching for the water of life.

name: Grail Diagram
#comment: A diagram of the grail, given by Thalia. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pushkin of Giran Castle Town.

name: Thalia's 1st Letter
#comment: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Arkenia, who is at the Altar of Rites.

name: Thalia's 2nd Letter
#comment: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Isael Silvershadow of the Hunters Village.

name: Thalia's Instructions
#comment: A letter containing Thalia's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Pushkin's List
#comment: A list given by Blacksmith Pushkin. "10 pure Mithril Ore, 20 ant soldier acid, 20 Wyrm talons"

name: Pure Mithril Cup
#comment: A cup crafted by Blacksmith Pushkin that is made of pure mithril. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Arkenia's Contract
#comment: A contract written by Arkenia. The contract states that she will give stardust in return for Andariel's book from the Village of Gludin.

name: Arkenia's Instructions
#comment: Arkenia's instructions. The instructions are to bring back Andariel's book from the Temple of Einhasad in the Village of Gludin.

name: Adonius's list
#comment: A list given by Priest Adonius: 20 spider ichor and 20 harpy's down.

name: Andariel Scripture Copy
#comment: A copy of Andariel's book given by Priest Adonius. Take this back to Arkenia.

name: Stardust
#comment: The silver dust received from Arkenia of the Dark Elves. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Isael's Instructions
#comment: A document containing Isael Silvershadow's instructions. It asks you to recover 6 pieces of talins spear from Leto lizardman shamans.

name: Isael's Letter
#comment: A letter given by Isael Silvershadow. Take this back to Thalia along with Talin's spear.

name: Grail of Purity
#comment: A grail crafted of pure mithril. Catch the tears of the unicorn with the grail and take it back to Thalia.

name: Tears of Unicorn
#comment: The tears shed by Eva's unicorn when it is killed with Talin's spear. Take this back to Thalia.

name: Water of Life
#comment: The holy water that contains the powers of life to rejuvenate the Mother Tree. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Pure Mithril Ore
#comment: The ore of pure mithril. Gather 10 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Ant Soldier Acid
#comment: The acid collected from ant soldiers after slaying them. Gather 20 bottles of this, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Wyrm's Talon
#comment: The talon of a wyrm obtained after slaying it. Gather 20 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Spider Ichor
#comment: The ichor of a marsh spider. Gather 20 units of this and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Harpy's Down
#comment: The down feathers obtained after slaying a harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them back to Priest Adonius.

name: Talin's Spear Blade
#comment: The blade portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Spear Shaft
#comment: The shaft portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Ruby
#comment: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Aquamarine
#comment: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Amethyst
#comment: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Peridot
#comment: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow.

name: Mark of Fate
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Fate. An item for occupational change.

name: Kaira's Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Magister Kaira to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad. This must be delivered secretly.

name: Metheus's Funeral Jar
#comment: A jar for storing the remains of the dead. Take this to the Execution Grounds and search for the remains of Metheus's sister.

name: Kasandra's Remains
#comment: The remains of Kasandra, Metheus's sister. Take this back to Brother Metheus.

name: Herbalism Textbook
#comment: A textbook of various herbs and their usages. It also contains information about the deadly poison belladonna.

name: Ixia's List
#comment: 10 units each of medusa's blood, marsh spider fluids, dead seeker's dung, tyrant's blood and nightshade root.

name: Medusa's Ichor
#comment: The bottled blood of a medusa. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

name: Marsh Spider Fluids
#comment: The bottled fluids of a marsh spider. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Dead Seeker Dung
#comment: The dung of dead seeker bats. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Tyrant's Blood
#comment: The bottled blood of tyrant. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Nightshade Root
#comment: The roots of the rare nightshade herb. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia.

name: Belladonna
#comment: A legendary poison that can kill a bull with a single drop. Take this to Brother Metheus.

name: Alder's Skull
#comment: The skull of Alders, who drafted the copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Alders Skull
#comment: Skull of Priest Alders. Take it to Magister Roa, a distant descendant of the priest.

name: Alder's Receipt
#comment: The receipt for the item that Alder entrusted to the warehouse. Take this and go to the warehouse in the Village of Gludin.

name: Revelations Manuscript
#comment: A copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira.

name: Kaira's Instructions
#comment: A note where Magister Kaira's instructions are written. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Kaira's Recommendation
#comment: A recommendation letter written by Magister Kaira. Take this and go to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elf Village.

name: Palus Charm
#comment: A charm given by Tetrarch Thifiell to keep in possession until the Initiation Ceremony of the Shilien Circle is complete.

name: Thifiell's Letter
#comment: A letter from Tetrarch Thifiell to Arkenia. Arkenia is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar.

name: Arkenia's Note
#comment: A note written by Arkenia. It contains instructions to bring back red fairy dust and blight treant sap.

name: Pixy Garnet
#comment: A garnet given by the bloody pixy as a mark of promise. Bring back 10 skulls each from four different races.

name: Grandis's Skull
#comment: The skull of a Grandis. Collect ten of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Karul Bugbear Skull
#comment: The skull of a Karul Bugbear. Collect 10 of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Breka Overlord Skull
#comment: Skull of a Breka orc overlord. Collect 10 of them and take them to Bloody Pixy.

name: Leto Overlord Skull
#comment: The skull of a Leto lizardman chief. Collect 10 of these and take them back to the bloody pixy.

name: Red Fairy Dust
#comment: Red fairy dust given by the bloody pixy. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Blight Treant Seed
#comment: A seed given by a blight treant as a mark of promise. Slay the black willow lurker and bring back its leaf.

name: Black Willow Leaf
#comment: A leaf obtained by slaying the black willow lurker. Take this to the Blight Treant.

name: Blight Treant Sap
#comment: The sap of a blight treant. Take this to Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Letter
#comment: A letter written by Arkenia. It states that the Initiation Ceremony of the Shilien Circle is complete. Take this to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Mark of Glory
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Glory. An item for occupational change.

name: Vokian's Order
#comment: Collect and return with 10 manashen shards, 10 tyrant talons and 10 guardian basilisk fangs.

name: Manashen Shard
#comment: A shard of the broken manashen. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Tyrant Talon
#comment: The talons plucked from a slain Tyrant. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
#comment: The fangs of a slain guardian basilisk. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian.

name: Vokian's Order
#comment: Prefect Vokian's orders. The instructions are to go and seek out the Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

name: Necklace of Authority
#comment: A symbol given to those representing Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Chianta's 1st Order
#comment: Orders of Gandi Chief Chianta. The instructions are to go and recover the flame scepter from the lower orc tribes.

name: Scepter of Breka
#comment: Scepter of flame which can be obtained from a Breka orc chief. Take it along with 4 other tribes' scepters and go see Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Enku
#comment: The flame scepter received from the Enku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Vuku
#comment: The flame scepter received from the Vuku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Turek
#comment: The flame scepter received from the Turek orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Tunath
#comment: The flame scepter received from the Lennunt orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Chianta's 2nd Order
#comment: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to come back for further orders after reaching level 38.

name: Chianta's 3rd Order
#comment: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to bring back 20 each of Timak and Tamlin orc heads.

name: Tamlin Orc Skull
#comment: The head of a Tamlin orc cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Timak Orc Head
#comment: The head of a Timak orc, cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter Box
#comment: A box containing the 5 flame scepters recovered from the lesser orc tribes. Take this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village.

name: Pashika's Head
#comment: Kill Pashika, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Vultus' Head
#comment: Kill Vultus, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Glove of Voltar
#comment: Glove that was thrown out by Breka Chief Voltar. Slay Pashika and Vultus, sons of Voltar.

name: Enku Overlord Head
#comment: The head of an Enku overlord, cut off after being slain. Show this to Enku Chief Kepra.

name: Glove of Kepra
#comment: The glove thrown down by Enku Chief Kepra. Go and slay the Enku overlords.

name: Makum Bugbear Head
#comment: The head of a Makum bugbear warrior, cut off after being slain. Show this to Turek Chief Burai.

name: Glove of Burai
#comment: The glove thrown down by Turek Chief Burai. Go and slay the Makum bugbear warriors.

name: Manakia's 1st Letter
#comment: Letter of Seer Manakia. Take it to Breka orc chief.

name: Manakia's 2nd Letter
#comment: Seer Manakia's letter. Take this and go to the Enku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 1st Letter
#comment: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Vuku Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 2nd Letter
#comment: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Turek Orc Chief.

name: Kasman's 3rd Letter
#comment: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Lennunt Orc Chief.

name: Driko's Contract
#comment: Vuku Chief Driko's contract. The contract contains instructions to hunt the marsh stakato drones in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Stakato Drone Husk
#comment: The husks of a marsh stakato drone. Collect 30 of these and take them to Vuku Chief Driko.

name: Tanapi's Order
#comment: Seer Tanapi's orders. Hunt the Lennunt Orc Chief and seers and recover the dcepter of Tantos.

name: Scepter of Tantos
#comment: The flame scepter of the now-perished Tantos tribe. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Ritual Box
#comment: A box containing the scepters recovered from the Orcs of the Tantos tribe. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai.

name: Mark of Prosperity
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Prosperity. An occupation change related item.

name: 1st Ring of Testimony
#comment: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find the 4 proofs of prosperity.

name: 2nd Ring of Testimony
#comment: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry.

name: Old Account Book
#comment: Iron Gate Lockirin's account book. The proof of wealth. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Blessed Seed
#comment: A seed containing the blessings of Maphr. The proof of fertile lands. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Emily's Recipe
#comment: A recipe good for childbirth and childbirth recovery. The proof of fertility. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Lilith's Elven Wafer
#comment: Food regarded as the secret to the Elves' longevity. The proof of health. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
#comment: A fragment of Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Giran Castle Town.

name: Collection License
#comment: A license that allows the bearer to collect guild contributions. Seek out those who still owe contributions and collect the funds from them.

name: Lockirin's 1st Notice
#comment: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Lockirin's 2nd Notice
#comment: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Lockirin's 3rd Notice
#comment: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef.

name: Lockirin's 4th Notice
#comment: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Lockirin's 5th Notice
#comment: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Contribution of Shari
#comment: Trader Shari's guild contribution. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Contribution of Mion
#comment: Trader Mion's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Contribution of Maryse
#comment: Maryse Redbonnet's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki.

name: Maryse's Request
#comment: The note containing Maryse Redbonnet's request. The instructions are to bring back 100 animal skins. Animal skins are a manufacturing ingredient item.

name: Contribution of Toma
#comment: Master Toma's guild contribution. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Receipt of Bolter
#comment: Miner Bolter's contribution receipt. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin to confirm if Miner Bolter has already submitted his contribution.

name: 1st Receipt of Contribution
#comment: The contribution receipt received from Golden Wheel's Spiron. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: 2nd Receipt of Contribution
#comment: The contribution receipt received from Silver Scale's Balanki. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: 3rd Receipt of Contribution
#comment: The contribution receipt received from Bronze Key's Keef. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: 4th Receipt of Contribution
#comment: A contribution receipt received from Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: 5th Receipt of Contribution
#comment: The contribution receipt received from Black Anvil's Arin. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockrin of the Iron Gate.

name: Procuration of Torocco
#comment: The bearer of this procuration hereby agrees to make contributions on behalf of Torocco. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef.

name: Bright's List
#comment: A list of ingredients that Guard Bright has written. "20 mandragora petals, 10 bunches of crimson moss"

name: Mandragora Petal
#comment: The petals of a mandragora flower. Collect 20 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Crimson Moss
#comment: Crimson Moss obtained from giant red ants. Collect 10 of these and take them to Guard Bright.

name: Mandragora Bouquet
#comment: A flower bouquet made of mandragora petals and crimson moss. Take this to Emily in the Town of Dion.

name: Parman's Instructions
#comment: A note containing Warehouse Keeper Parman's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38.

name: Parman's Letter
#comment: Warehouse Keeper Parman's letter. Take this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower.

name: Clay Dough
#comment: A piece of clay that Maestro Nikola has given. Use this to make a copy of the keyhole from the titan's box.

name: Pattern of Keyhole
#comment: The keyhole pattern made from clay dough. Take this to Maestro Nikola.

name: Nikolas' List
#comment: 20 stakato shells, 10 toad lord sacs, 10 spider thorns and 10 D-grade crystals.

name: Stakato Shell
#comment: The shell of a marsh stakato. A key ingredient in making the titan's key.

name: Toad Lord Sac
#comment: The poison sac removed from the neck of a toad lord. A key ingredient in making the titan's key.

name: Spider Thorn
#comment: A thorn removed from the shell of a swamp spider. A key ingredient in making the titan's key.

name: Mark of Champion
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Champion. An item for occupational change.

name: Ascalon's 1st Letter
#comment: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Mason in the Town of Dion.

name: Mason's Letter
#comment: A letter from Mason to Veteran Ascalon of Giran Castle Town.

name: Iron Rose Ring
#comment: A ring given by Mason. The ring is engraved with the symbol of the iron rose. Complete the revenge in place of Mason.

name: Ascalon's 2nd Letter
#comment: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: White Rose Insignia
#comment: An insignia given by Trader Groot. It was formerly worn by the medics of the iron rose. Aid Trader Groot in his material gathering.

name: Groot's Letter
#comment: A letter from Trader Groot to Veteran Ascalon in Giran Castle Town.

name: Ascalon's 3rd Letter
#comment: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Captain Mouen of the Town of Oren.

name: Mouen's 1st Order
#comment: Cut off and bring back the heads of 100 road scavengers or road collectors.

name: Mouen's 2nd Order
#comment: Destroy the Leto lizardmen and bring back 100 of their fangs.

name: Mouen's Letter
#comment: A letter from Captain Mouen to Veteran Ascalon of Giran Castle Town.

name: Harpy's Egg
#comment: An egg obtained after slaying a harpy. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Medusa's Venom
#comment: The venom obtained after slaying a medusa. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Windsus Bile
#comment: The bile obtained after slaying a windsus. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Giran Castle Town.

name: Bloody Axe Head
#comment: The head of a Bloody Axe Elite. Collect 100 of these and return to Mason in the Town of Dion.

name: Road Ratman Head
#comment: The severed head of a road scavenger or road collector. Collect 100 of them and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Leto Lizardman Fang
#comment: The fangs of a slain Leto lizardman. Collect 100 of these and take them to Captain Mouen.

name: Mark of Sagittarius
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Sagittarius. An occupation change related item.

name: Bernard's Introduction
#comment: Take this letter and go to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Hamil's 1st Letter
#comment: Take this letter and meet with Sir Aron Tanford of the Southern Wastelands.

name: Hamil's 2nd Letter
#comment: Take this letter and go to Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town.

name: Hamil's 3rd Letter
#comment: Take this letter and go to Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Hunter's 1st Rune
#comment: A stone engraved with a hunter's rune. Collect 10 of these and take them to Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Hunter's 2nd Rune
#comment: A rune obtained from Breka orc overlords or Shamans. Collect 10 of these and take them, along with the snake talisman, to Prefect Vokian.

name: Talisman of Kadesh
#comment: A strange talisman obtained after slaying Kadesh. Take this to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran.

name: Talisman of Snake
#comment: Talisman that is related to a serpent totem spirit worshipped by Breka orcs. Take it to Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town.

name: Mithril Clip
#comment: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Stakato Chitin
#comment: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Reinforced Bowstring
#comment: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Manashen's Horn
#comment: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Blood of Lizardman
#comment: The blood shed by Leto Lizardmen. Kadesh appears when enough of this is gathered.

name: Mark of Witchcraft
#comment: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of Witchcraft. An occupation change related item.

name: Orim's Diagram
#comment: A diagram of relics, given by Orim of the Shadow. The 6 jewels needed for opening the Cube of Aklantoth are depicted here.

name: Alexandria's Book
#comment: A book that contains records on who purchased Aklantoth's Gems. "Magister Iker, Magister Kaira, Trader Lara"

name: Iker's List
#comment: Collect and bring back 20 dire wyrm fangs, 20 Leto lizardman charms, and 20 enchanted stone golem heartstones.

name: Dire Wyrm Fang
#comment: The fangs of a slain Dire Wyrm. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Leto Lizardman Charm
#comment: A totem obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Enchanted Golem Heartstone
#comment: A crystal found amongst the shattered fragments of an enchanted stone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker.

name: Lara's Memo
#comment: Trader Lara's sales records. It is recorded that a man named Ismel bought the jewel from Lara.

name: Nestle's Memo
#comment: Trader Lara's purchase records. It is recorded that Leopold of the Black Lion brought the jewel.

name: Leopold's Journal
#comment: A portion of Leopold's Diary. It is recorded that 3 deserters died and became undead while escaping to the Wastelands.

name: Aklantoth 1st Gem
#comment: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Iker. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 2nd Gem
#comment: The gem given by Magister Kaira. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 3rd Gem
#comment: The gem that can be obtained by killing a nameless revenant. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 4th Gem
#comment: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 5th Gem
#comment: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth 6th Gem
#comment: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow.

name: 1st Brimstone
#comment: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel when escaping from his binds.

name: Orim's Instructions
#comment: A set of instructions written by Orim of the Shadow. The instructions are to bring back the Sword of Binding and Soul Trap Crystal.

name: Orim's 1st Letter
#comment: A letter from Orim of the Shadow to Sir Karol Vasper of the Town of Gludin. The letter asks for the loan of the Sword of the Seal.

name: Orim's 2nd Letter
#comment: A letter from Orim of the Shadows to Magister Iker of Giran Castle Town. The letter asks for the loan of the Soul-trap Crystal.

name: Sir Vasper's Letter
#comment: A letter from Sir Klaus Vasper to Vadin of the Town of Oren. The letter gives permission for the use of the Sword of Binding.

name: Vadin's Crucifix
#comment: A holy crucifix of the order, given by Vadin. Take this and go hunt Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
#comment: Amulets that the Tamlin Orcs carry for sorcery purposes. Gather 20 of these and take them to Vadin.

name: Vadin's Sanctions
#comment: A sanctions letter from Vadin allowing for the use of the Sword of Binding. Take this to Sir Klaus Vasper of the Town of Gludin.

name: Iker's Amulet
#comment: An amulet given by Magister Iker. It is said to have powers of protection against evil...

name: Soultrap Crystal
#comment: A crystal with the power to trap and seal the soul of a monster. Use this to seal the spirit of the Drevanul Zeruel.

name: Purgatory Key
#comment: A key needed to close Aklantoth's Chest. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
#comment: A crystal that contains the trapped soul of the Drevanul Zeruel. Take this to Orim of the Shadow.

name: 2nd Brimstone

#comment: Collect 30 Breka orc totems from Breka's Stronghold and 30 crimson bloodstones of fettered soul from Death Pass.

#comment: Collect 30 Tyrant Talons from the Wastelands and 30 Windsus Tusks from Death Pass.

name: Lara's 5th List
#comment: Collect 30 noble ant wings from the Ant Nest and 30 wyrm fangs from Gorgon's Flower Garden.

#comment: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 D-grade gemstone, 3 silver nuggets and 10 pieces of toad lord back skin.

name: Deluxe Fairy Stone List
#comment: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 C-grade gemstone, 1 stone of purity, 5 nuggets of silver and 20 pieces of toad lord back skin.

name: Toad Lord Back Skin
#comment: Haggard backskin of a toad lord. Ingredient used for removing impurities from fairy stone.

name: Juice of Monkshood
#comment: Medicine needed to talk with drakes or wyrms.

name: Scale of Drake Exarion
#comment: Scale of drake exarion. Take this and recover 20 eggs from leto lizardman warriors near Oren Castle.

name: Egg of Drake Exarion
#comment: Egg of drake exarion recovered from leto lizardman warriors.

name: Scale of Drake Zwov
#comment: Scale of drake zwov. Take this and recover 20 eggs from marsh spiders of Cruma Marshlands.

name: Egg of Drake Zwov
#comment: Egg of drake zwov recovered from marsh spiders.

name: Scale of Drake Kalibran
#comment: Scale of drake kalibran. Take this and recover 20 eggs from road scavengers near Corridor of Death.

name: Egg of Drake Kalibran
#comment: Egg of drake kalibran recovered from road scavengers.

name: Scale of Wyvern Suzet
#comment: Scale of wyvern suzet. Take this and recover 20 eggs from breka orc overlords in northern Giran.

name: Egg of Wyvern Suzet
#comment: Egg of wyvern suzet recovered from breka orc overlords.

name: Scale of Wyvern Shamhai
#comment: Scale of wyvern shamhai. Take this and recover 20 eggs from deadseekers of the Execution Grounds.

name: Egg of Wyvern Shamhai
#comment: Egg of wyvern shamhai recovered from deadseekers.

name: Herb of Harit
#comment: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Herb of Vanor
#comment: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Herb of Oel Mahum
#comment: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Blood of Eva
#comment: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time.

name: Athrea's Coin
#comment: If you collect three Athrea's coins and take them to Witch Athrea, you will be able to obtain Eva's Blood.

name: Symbol of Loyalty
#comment: Certificate exchanged for life of clan member. Take this to clan leader.

name: Recipe: Titan's Powerstone
#comment: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Quest. Required to make a Titan's Powerstone. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 2. The success rate is 25%.

name: Mist Drake Egg
#comment: Egg of mist drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Blitz Wyrm Egg
#comment: Egg of blitz wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Drake Egg
#comment: Egg of drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Thunder Wyrm Egg
#comment: Egg of thunder wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien.

name: Brooch of the Magpie
#comment: This brooch that was left by a dying Dwarf to be delivered to Head Blacksmith Kusto, his younger brother in Giran Castle Town.

name: Nebulite Crystals
#comment: Soulshot of unknown identity. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and Titan's powerstones and take it all to Balthazar.

name: Broken Titan's Powerstone
#comment: Titan's Powerstone. It is broken and useless.

name: Titan's Powerstone
#comment: Titan's Powerstone. The clan leader must collect ten of these and also, ten Nebulite Crystals and take them all to Balthazar.

name: Imperial Key
#comment: Key used when opening imperial coffer. Must have all six to open the coffer.

name: Undead Ash
#comment: Ash dust remaining after an undead of the Execution Grounds is destroyed. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Bloody Axe Insignia
#comment: Insignia obtained from killing Ol Mahums in the Fortress of Resistance. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Delu Lizardman Fang
#comment: Tooth removed after killing a Delu Lizardman. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Stakato Talon
#comment: Claw cut off after killing marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshlands. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya.

name: Feather of Gabrielle
#comment: Mark given by Seal Guardian Gabrielle. Receive recognition for your abilities after taking this and meeting the other guardians.

name: Marsh Stalker Horn
#comment: The horn that was cut off of a marsh stalker after it was killed. Take it to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Marsh Drake Talons
#comment: The talons that were removed from a marsh drake after it was killed. Take them to Magister Kaiena, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Kranrot Skin
#comment: The skin that was removed from a Kranrot after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Hamrut Leg
#comment: The leg that was removed from a Hamrut and skinned after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Remains of Sacrified
#comment: The remains of a sacrified soul. Take them to High Priest Orven, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Totem of Land Dragon
#comment: The totem created by Harit lizardmen who worship Antharas. Take it to Master Kendra the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 1st Fragment of Abyss Jewel
#comment: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Gludio. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 2nd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
#comment: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Oren. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: 3rd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
#comment: Fragment obtained from destroying abyss jewel. Take this to Antharas Watchman Theodric at the entrance to Antharas' Lair.

name: Mara Fang
#comment: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Mara. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Musfel Fang
#comment: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Musfel. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal.

name: Mark of Watchman
#comment: Certificate of having been recognized by seal guardian. Return to Gabrielle after receiving certificates from guardians of each region.

name: Portal Stone
#comment: Item needed to activate the teleport crystal that teleports to Antharas' Lair.

name: Gustav's 1st Letter
#comment: A secret letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to his aides. Get a hold of it and take it to Martien of the Town of Giran.

name: Gustav's 2nd Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Balthazar of Hunter Village.

name: Gustav's 3rd Letter
#comment: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Sir Eric Rodemai of the Town of Aden.

name: Scepter of Judgment
#comment: Scepter bestowed on Founding Emperor Shunaiman of the ancient Elmoreden Empire by the god of light. Certificate representing the emperor's authority.

name: Seal of Aspiration
#comment: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 5.

name: Black Anvil Coin
#comment: Commemorative coin given as an expression of gratitude by the Black Anvil Guild.

name: Antidote Recipe List
#comment: Herb of Vanor, herb of oel mahum, herb of harit and blood of Eva.

name: Voucher of Faith

name: Alliance Manifesto
#comment: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 4.

#comment: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East or West Gate of the inner castle, or the guardian's location.

name: Mercenary Posting Ticket (Teleporter5)
#comment: Placed in Aden, at the Teleporter or inside the castle, this ticket allows teleportation to the outer castle, the East or West Gate of the inner castle, or the halls.
