#comment: Cargo that Trader Arodin needs to send to the Dark Elves. Find all 20 of them and take them to Trader Tyra.

name: Tyra's Bill
#comment: A note from Trader Tyra. Take it to Trader Arodin in Gludin Village.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 1
#comment: First piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 2
#comment: Second piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 3
#comment: Third piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Ranger's Report - Part 4
#comment: Fourth piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah.

name: Weapons Trade Contract
#comment: The contract that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. It is stamped with the Mark of the Dwarves. Take it to Guard Alvah.

name: Attack Directives
#comment: An operation order that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. Take it to Guard Alvah.

name: Certificate of the Silver Scale Guild
#comment: Certificate that verifies one's membership to the Silver Scale Guild.

name: Rolento's Cargobox
#comment: The war supplies that the Dwarven trader Rolento promised to send to Turek orcs. First, show it to Guard Alvah.

name: Ol Mahum Captain's Head
#comment: A severed head of an ol mahum captain. Collect 30 of them and take them to Turek Chief Burai.

name: Jade Crystal
#comment: Jade gemstone from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess
#comment: A statue of a goddess from an old empire that has been discovered in the cemetery. Take it to Priestess Flownia of Aden Castle Town.

name: GalfRedo Romer's Bust
#comment: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. Take it to Trader Galibredo of the Town of Oren.

name: Eye of the Shadow
#comment: Collect 50 eyes of the Shadow and take them to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Certificate of Participation: Battle Royal
#comment: The certificate that allows one to participate in a Battle Royal. This game is played by grade 1 members of the Coin Collectors Club.

name: Trade Cargo
#comment: The cargo boxes that have been robbed from the wagon of the Trade Guild. Collect 30 of them and take them to Guard Weisz.

name: Agnes's Holy Symbol
#comment: The Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad. This article was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with Agnes's Rosary to Priest Adonius.

name: Agnes's Rosary
#comment: A rosary used while praying. It was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with the Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad to Priest Adonius.

name: Sinister Totem
#comment: A black colored totem that exudes an evil aura. Take it to High Priestess Levian.

name: Bear Skin
#comment: The pelts obtained by hunting bears. Collect 20 of them and take them to Grocer Pano of Floran Village.

name: Enku Orc's Head
#comment: Beheaded head of an Enku Orc. Collect 100 of them and take them to Orc Lady Jennifer.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -1
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to High Prefect Drikus.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -2
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Priest Manuel.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -3
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Vuku Chief Driko.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -4
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Seer Somak.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -5
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Prefect Dowki.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -6
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Warden Endrigo.

name: Orc Heads Bouquet -7
#comment: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Captain Lucas.

name: Jennifer's Box
#comment: The box that a man who is smitten by Orc Lady Jennifer asked this to be delivered to her. What do you think is in the box...?

name: Articles of Dead Heroes
#comment: The articles of dead soldiers who were sent as an expeditionary force 1,000 years ago. These articles have been collected by hunting cave servants. Take them to Antharas Watchman Gilmore.

name: Old Key
#comment: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent Sir Kristof Rodemai is living in Giran Castle Town. Take it to him.

name: Old Hilt
#comment: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendant Duelist Kaien is living in the Town of Oren. Take it to him.

name: Totem Necklace
#comment: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent, High Prefect Garvarentz, is living in Hunters Village. Take it to him.

name: Einhasad Crucifix
#comment: An article left by a dead soldier. Take it to High Priest Orven of Einhasad Temple in Aden Castle Town where the dead soldier used to be stationed.

name: Victim's Arm Bone
#comment: The arm bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Thigh Bone
#comment: The thigh bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Skull
#comment: The skull of a victim who has been eaten alive by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Rib Bone
#comment: The rib bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Victim's Spine
#comment: The spine of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia.

name: Jar of Bones
#comment: An urn that contains the bones of all the victims. Ask Mad Doctor Orpheus to resurrect the victims.

name: Useless Bone Pieces
#comment: Useless bone pieces obtained after hunting Crokians. If you take them to Orpheus, perhaps something good will happen...?

name: Powder to Summon Dead Souls
#comment: The magic powder bought from Magister Xenovia. Throw it along with the victims' bones into the Psychic Medium's Urn.

name: Sack of the Dead
#comment: A sack containing a victim's soul. An urn was possessed by the victim's soul. Take it to Locksmith Dorothy.

name: Frog Prince
#comment: What are you waiting for? You promised to help me! Release me from this curse immediately! I must regain my appearance as soon as possible!!!

name: Fly Powder
#comment: Powder made by grinding dried flies. Use it when you fail in your attempt to transform a frog.

name: Calculator
#comment: The latest model of calculator. Take it to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Gemstone Beast's Crystal
#comment: Crystal obtained by slaying a gemstone beast. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Titan's Powerstone
#comment: The Titan's Powerstone that has been extracted from the corpse of a Giant. Take it to Magister Hanellin.

name: Hanellin's 1st Letter
#comment: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Magister Harne of the Dark Elven Villlage and receive your next assignment from her.

name: Hanellin's 2nd Letter
#comment: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Claudia Athebaldt of Aden Castle Town and receive your next assignment from her.

name: Hanellin's 3rd Letter
#comment: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Martien of the Giran Castle Town and receive your next assignment from him.

name: 1st Key of Ark
#comment: The key that was found upon the corpse of the guardian of the sacred ark. Use this key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: 2nd Key of Ark
#comment: The key that was taken after killing Elberos, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: 3rd Key of Ark
#comment: The key that was taken after killing Shadowfang, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object.

name: White Fabric
#comment: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Kill the Platinum Tribe Shamans and Overlords and soak the cloth with their blood.

name: Blooded Fabric
#comment: A piece of cloth soaked in the blood of angels and the Platinum race. Hanellin has told you that in order to challenge Baium, you must wrap this blood-soaked cloth around your body.

name: Order of Gosta
#comment: The order states that you should hunt Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman and bring back their fangs as proof.

name: Lizard Fang
#comment: The fangs that have been collected as proofs that Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman have been hunted.

name: Barrel of League
#comment: This seems to be the cargo that was stolen from Iason Heine's wagon by Tasaba Lizardmen.

name: Operation Document - 1/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 2/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 3/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 4/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 5/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 6/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 7/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 8/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 9/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Operation Document - 10/10
#comment: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?

name: Completed Operation Order
#comment: A book consisting of 10 pages of operation orders bound together. Who should we take it to...?

name: Bill of Iason Heine
#comment: The bill's face value is 1,000 adena. If you take it to Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril, you can use it to purchase various ingredients.

name: Gillian's Diary
#comment: Gillian's diary. The last entry was made one year ago.

name: Gillian's Notes
#comment: Partial lyrics of a song Gillian was jotting down.

name: Unfinished Music
#comment: An unfinished music score of a song that Gilian composed for a former lover.

name: Gillian's Heart
#comment: The heart that Gillian threw out to forget his feelings of love. Return it to the Revenant of Gillian.

name: Gandi Tribe's Relic
#comment: The sacred object of the Gandi Tribe that has been recovered from Bugbears. Take it to Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion.

name: Swan's Flute
#comment: A flute that Troubadour Swan had obtained as a gift for Musician Nanarin.

name: Swan's Letter
#comment: A love letter that Troubadour Swan wants to send to Musician Nanarin along with the flute. Take them to Musician Nanarin.

name: Event Clothes
#comment: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Nanarin's Flute
#comment: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Sabrin's Black Beer
#comment: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado.

name: Stolen Black Beer
#comment: Black beer that was stolen from Jonas. Take it to Trader Sabrin.

name: Stolen Event Clothes
#comment: Event clothes that were stolen from Trader Sonia. Take them to Guard Xaber.

name: Clothes Chest Key
#comment: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the clothes chest and retrieve the event clothes.

name: Beer Chest Key
#comment: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the beer chest and get the black beer out of it.

name: Fairy Leaf
#comment: A leaf given by Fairy Mimyu to put on the fairy's neck wound that was inflicted by a hatchling.

name: Ratman Scavenger's Skull
#comment: Heads of Ratman Scavengers that you hunted after receiving a request from Katari. Collect 10 of them and take them to Katari.

name: Turek War Hound's Tail
#comment: The tails of Turek war Hounds that Piotur asks you to catch. Collect 10 of them and take them to Piotur.

name: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart
#comment: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart. Take it to Elder Casian.

name: Trisalim Tarantula's Venom Sac
#comment: The venom sacs of Trisalim Tarantulas that Magister Joan asked you to hunt. Collect three and take them to Magister Joan.

name: Penitent's Manacles
#comment: A heavy set of manacles forged at the Black Judge's behest. Take them to the Black Judge.

name: Manual of Manacles
#comment: Blacksmith's Frame x 1, Steel x 5, Adamantite Nugget x 2, Silver Nugget x 10, Cokes x 10

name: Tarlk Amulet
#comment: A mark that can be obtained by catching a Tarlk Bugbear or a Tarlk Basilisk. Collect 30 and take them to a Clan Hall Herald.

name: Contest Certificate
#comment: A certificate that one can present to participate in the hunt for Tarlk Basilisks, a preliminary contest for a Clan Hall Siege War.

name: Ant's Ichor
#comment: Bodily fluids extracted from ants or ant captains. Collect 20 and take them to Elder Casian.

name: Noble Ant's Nerve Tissue
#comment: The nerve tissue harvested from a Noble Ant's head. Take it to Elder Casian along with the Ant's Ichor.

name: Casian's Enzyme
#comment: Enzyme created by Elder Casian. Find the Ant Larvae sleeping within the the Ant Nest Dungeon and administer the enzyme to them.

name: Alligator Leather
#comment: Pelts obtained from alligators caught on Alligator island. You can sell it to Enverun.

name: Blue Back Alligator Leather
#comment: Leather from Blue Back Alligators caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enberun at a high price.

name: Jewel Studded Alligator Leather
#comment: A piece of Jewel Studded Alligator Leather caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enberun at a high price.

name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Belt
#comment: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gabana, a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Belt made.

name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Purse
#comment: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gabana, a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Purse made.

name: Crystal of Water
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of water. You should find the Stone Statue of Water and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Fire
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of fire. You should find the Stone Statue of Fire and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Wind
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of wind. You should find the Stone Statue of Wind and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Earth
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of earth. You should find the Stone Statue of Earth and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Darkness
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of darkness You should find the Stone Statue of Darkness and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Crystal of Light
#comment: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of light. You should find the Stone Statue of Light and dedicate it to the statue.

name: Jade Crystal
#comment: Jade crystals that had been gathered from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village.

name: Bust of Ancient Goddess
#comment: A statue of a goddess that was created by the ancient sculptor Berona in ancient times.

name: The Work of the ancient sculptor Berona
#comment: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. It has not been evaluated by antique experts yet.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess - Prototype
#comment: A statue created by Berona, an ancient sculptor. - Prototype

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess - Original
#comment: A statue created by Berona, a sculptor in ancient times. - Original

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess - Replica
#comment: Replicated statues that have been created by present day sculptors who imitated Berona's works.

name: Ancient Statue of Goddess - Forgery
#comment: Forgeries that have been created in imitation of the ancient sculptor Berona's works.

name: Blue Eva
#comment: Special Coin

name: Gold Einhasad
#comment: Special Coin

name: Silver Shilen
#comment: Special Coin

name: Bloody Pa'agrio
#comment: Special Coin

name: Barrel of Liquor
#comment: A barrel that is filled to the brim with delicious and fragrant liquor. The barrel is very heavy.

name: Precious Scarab
#comment: A scarab that is transparent and shines like a precious stone. Among hustlers it is traded at a high price.

name: Simbelmyne
#comment: A type of flower that is believed to have the power to heal sickness. It is a favorite of elves.

name: Odd (looking) Doll
#comment: It is a strange looking statue of a living creature that looks like an imp. It is an orc's favorite item.

name: Scarlet Dress
#comment: A very attractive scarlet Aden-style dress designed for a virtuous lady.

name: Nebulite Orb
#comment: It is made by cutting Nebulite into a spherical shape. Take this to Magic Trader Cema in Hardin's Academy.

name: Ectoplasm Liqueur
#comment: An exotic tasting liqueur made from ectoplasm. Very popular among connoisseurs.

name: Prince's Trophy
#comment: The winning trophy that Prince Malcom won in a dance competition. You can sell it at a store or keep it as a souvenir.

name: Prince's Autobiography
#comment: The autobiography of Prince Malcom that bears his hand-written signature. Sell it at a store.

name: Prince's Bust
#comment: A statue of Prince Malcom made of pure gold. Although quite ugly, it will fetch a handsome price.

name: Silk Handkerchief
#comment: A beautiful and elaborate handkerchief decorated with a flower pattern and lace. Its design could attract the attention of princes and princesses.

name: Luxurious Goblet
#comment: A luxuriously designed goblet. It seems to be an object made during the period of the Elmo Aden Empire.

name: Scepter of Darkness
#comment: A staff that gives off dark magic power. On its handle, the words "Great Demon King" are engraved.

name: Succubus Perfume
#comment: Perfume used by Succubus noblewomen. A very strong fragrance, not popular among Elves and Humans.

name: Succubus Mirror
#comment: A mirror used by Succubus noblewomen when they put on cosmetics. It is also said to be used occasionally by blood queens.

name: Heart of Darkness
#comment: A heart-shaped stone piece that gives off the aura of dark magic power. On its reverse, the words "I love you Merkenis!" are engraved.

name: Royal Orc Totem
#comment: A totem made by carving out a whole lump of red granite.

name: Pearl Trodden/Trampled By A Wild Hog
#comment: A walnut sized bead that is smeared with dirt. Perhaps, it is a pearl.

name: Boar's Tusk
#comment: The tusk of a boar that looks somewhat similar to the ivory of an elephant.

name: Sweet Potato
#comment: A large sized sweet potato that was just plucked out of the soil. You s it or roast it. It will make a delicious treat.

name: Beast's Claws
#comment: White lion's sharp claws. It is rumored that it is being traded among collectors at a high price.

name: Beast's Mane
#comment: A white lion's luxuriant mane. It is rumored to be sold at a high price among collectors.

name: Ginseng Root
#comment: Rare medicine imported from the Orient.

name: Honey Jar
#comment: A jar containing sweet honey.

name: Bear's Gall
#comment: The gall of a bear that is known to be highly effective in promoting one's health and well-being as well as having mysterious healing properties.

name: Fresh Samon
#comment: A fresh salmon that seems to have been just caught from a river.

name: Sushi Riceball
#comment: The Schuttgart type sushi rice ball. The delicious seasoning of well minced meat gets absorbed into the rice and produces a wonderful taste.

name: Avellan Spice
#comment: Exotic spice that has been imported from Avella of the Orient.

name: Lucky Rabbit Weed
#comment: Rabbit weed that is supposed to bring luck. It is the favorite food of rabbits and elpys.

name: Malcom's Check
#comment: A check of tremendous face value signed by Prince Malcom. It can be cashed at a warehouse in Giran Castle Town.

name: Deposit Box Key
#comment: A key for a private deposit box located in a warehouse in Giran Castle Town.

name: Dwarven Royal Seal
#comment: A royal seal made of carved jade. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

name: Dwarven Royal Crown
#comment: A king's crown made of gold. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family.

name: Dwarven Dance Manual
#comment: A dance manual that details ballroom dancing techniques. This book will make you a dancing hero!

name: Calculator
#comment: Allows one to perform a simple calculation.

name: Hanellin's White Flower
#comment: A mark of Hannelin. Along with your companions each carrying a red flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Aden Castle Town to see her.

name: Hanellin's Red Flower
#comment: A mark of Hannelin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Aden Castle Town to see her.

name: Hanellin's Yellow Flower
#comment: A mark of Hannelin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and red flower respectively, go to Aden Castle Town to see her.

name: Book of Saint
#comment: The book of Saint Solina. Take it along with the blood of a Saint and the bough of a Saint to Magister Hanellin.

name: Blood of Saint
#comment: The blood of Saint Solina, hardened into a dark-colored substance contained in a glass bottle. Take it, along with the Book of Saint and the Bough of Saint to Magister Hanellin.

name: Bough of Saint
#comment: The Scepter of Saint Solina. It appears to be just a dead dry tree branch. Take it along with the book of a Saint and the blood of a Saint and take it to Magister Hanellin.

name: White Fabric
#comment: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Hanellin will tell you its purpose.

name: Green Dimensional Stone
#comment: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the first floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Blue Dimensional Stone
#comment: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the fifth floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Red Dimensional Stone
#comment: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 10th floor of the Tower of Insolence.

name: Green Dimensional Stone - Shard
#comment: A broken shard of the green Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Kaplan.

name: Blue Dimensional Stone - Shard
#comment: A broken shard of the blue Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Euclie.

name: Red Dimensional Stone - Shard
#comment: A broken shard of the red Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Pitagon.

name: Bill of Iason Heine
#comment: Its value is 1000 adena, redeemable by Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril. You can use it to buy various ingredients.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Love
#comment: Posthumously released musical score of Gillian. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Battle
#comment: The musical score for the Battle March of Flames. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Journey
#comment: A musical score composed by Troubadour Swan. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Journey
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a journey. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Battle
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a battle.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Love
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of love. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Solitude
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of solitude. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of the Feast
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a feast. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Celebration
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a celebration. May only be used once.

name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Comedy
#comment: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a comedy. May only be used once.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Celebration
#comment: A musical score containing the theme music of a celebration. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Comedy
#comment: A musical score containing the theme music of a comedy. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of Solitude
#comment: A musical score composed by Musician Nanarin. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Musical Score - Theme of the Feast
#comment: A musical score composed by Musician Barbado. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made.

name: Dragon Bugle of Wind
#comment: A bugle used to play the strider of the Wind.

name: Dragon Bugle of Star
#comment: A bugle used to play the strider of a Star.

name: Dragon Bugle of Dusk
#comment: A bugle used to play the strider of the Dusk.

name: Penitent's Manacles
#comment: The heavy manacles used to summon a Sin Eater. Summoning the Sin Eater consumes all the summoner's Exp. The Sin Eater must be fed Food for Wolves.

name: Manacles of Penitent
#comment: Having consumed your sins, the Sin Eater has disappeared, leaving you with this ordinary pair of manacles. To repeat this quest, take them back to the Black Judge.

name: Alligator Leather Belt
#comment: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman.

name: Blue Alligator Leather Belt
#comment: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather.

name: Bejeweled Leather Belt
#comment: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a Leather that is studded with rare jewels.

name: Alligator Leather Purse
#comment: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman.

name: Blue Alligator Leather Purse
#comment: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather.

name: Bejeweled Purse
#comment: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made of Leather studded with rare jewels.

name: Elemental Stone Powder
#comment: Elemental stone powder obtained from a stone statue in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Elemental Stone Shards
#comment: The shards of elemental stones obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Elemental Stone Lump
#comment: The lumps of elemental stone obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell.

name: Bentley's Request
#comment: A request to find and bring back jade crystals from creatures such as Fline, Liele, Satyr etc. that inhabit the Enchanted Valley.

name: Carson's Request
#comment: A request to recover the works of the ancient sculptor Berona from Hatar Ratmen and Vanor Silenos in the area near the Cemetery.

name: Knuckle Duster Edge
#comment: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Knuckle Duster. It can be bought from a regular store.

name: Avadon Shield Fragment
#comment: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make an Avadon Shield. It can be bought from a regular store.

name: Recipe: Knuckle Duster
#comment: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Knuckle Duster. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 5. The success rate is 100%.

name: Recipe: Avadon Shield
#comment: For Dwarves only. The recipe for an Avadon Shield. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 6. The success rate is 100%.

name: Lottery Ticket
#comment: A lottery ticket from Aden, redeemable at any lottery sales location. Winning numbers are posted every Saturday at 7 p.m. You can't win if you don't play! Good luck!

name: Monster Race Ticket - Single
#comment: A winning ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race.

name: Monster Race Ticket - Double
#comment: A winning daily double ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race.
